/.editorconfig:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | # https://editorconfig.org
 2 |
 3 | root = true
 4 |
 5 | [*]
 6 | charset = utf-8
 7 | indent_style = space
 8 | indent_size = 2
 9 | end_of_line = lf
10 | insert_final_newline = true
11 | trim_trailing_whitespace = true
12 |
13 | [*.md]
14 | insert_final_newline = false
15 | trim_trailing_whitespace = false
16 |
17 | [COMMIT_EDITMSG]
18 | max_line_length = 0
19 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.env.data:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | GITEE_USERNAME=
 2 | GITEE_PASSWORD=
 3 |
 4 | BLOG_CHANGELOG_WINCLIENT_ZH_ID=
 5 | BLOG_CHANGELOG_WINCLIENT_EN_ID=
 6 | BLOG_CHANGELOG_WINCLIENT_JA_ID=
 7 | BLOG_CHANGELOG_WEB_ZH_ID=
 8 | BLOG_CHANGELOG_WEB_EN_ID=
 9 | BLOG_CHANGELOG_WEB_JA_ID=
10 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.gitattributes:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | * text eol=lf
 2 | *.txt text eol=crlf
 3 |
 4 | *.png binary
 5 | *.jpg binary
 6 | *.jpeg binary
 7 | *.gif binary
 8 | *.tif binary
 9 | *.tiff binary
10 | *.webp binary
11 | *.ico binary
12 | *.ttf binary
13 | *.woff binary
14 | *.woff2 binary
15 |
16 | *.md linguist-vendored=false
17 | *.md linguist-generated=false
18 | *.md linguist-documentation=false
19 | *.md linguist-detectable=true
20 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.github/_typos.toml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | [files]
 2 | extend-exclude = [
 3 |   "**/*.json",
 4 |   "**/*.svg",
 5 |   "pnpm-lock.yaml",
 6 |   ".markdownlintignore",
 7 |   ".prettierignore",
 8 |   ".eslintrc.yml"
 9 | ]
10 |

/.github/workflows/check-zh.yml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | name: CHECK-CHINESE-TEXT
 2 |
 3 | env:
 4 |   NODE_OPTIONS: --max-old-space-size=6144
 5 |
 6 | on:
 7 |   push:
 8 |     branches: [main]
 9 |     paths:
10 |       - '**/zh/**/*.md'
11 |   pull_request:
12 |     branches: [main]
13 |     types: [opened]
14 |
15 |   workflow_dispatch:
16 |
17 | concurrency:
18 |   group: ${{ github.workflow }}-${{ github.event.number || github.sha }}
19 |   cancel-in-progress: true
20 |
21 | jobs:
22 |   test:
23 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
24 |
25 |     strategy:
26 |       matrix:
27 |         node_version:
28 |           - 20
29 |
30 |     steps:
31 |       - name: Checkout
32 |         uses: actions/checkout@v3
33 |         with:
34 |           # “最近更新时间” 等 git 日志相关信息，需要拉取全部提交记录
35 |           fetch-depth: 0
36 |       - uses: pnpm/action-setup@v4
37 |         name: Install pnpm
38 |         with:
39 |           run_install: false
40 |
41 |       - name: Install Node.js (${{ matrix.node_version }})
42 |         uses: actions/setup-node@v4
43 |         with:
44 |           node-version: ${{ matrix.node_version }}
45 |           cache: 'pnpm'
46 |
47 |       - name: Install dependencies
48 |         run: pnpm install
49 |
50 |       - name: Linter zh markdown
51 |         run: pnpm run lint:zh
52 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.github/workflows/check.yml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | name: CHECK
 2 |
 3 | env:
 4 |   NODE_OPTIONS: --max-old-space-size=6144
 5 |
 6 | on:
 7 |   push:
 8 |     branches: [main]
 9 |   pull_request:
10 |     branches: [main]
11 |     types: [opened, synchronize, reopened]
12 |   workflow_dispatch:
13 |
14 | concurrency:
15 |   group: ${{ github.workflow }}-${{ github.event.number || github.sha }}
16 |   cancel-in-progress: true
17 |
18 | jobs:
19 |   test:
20 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
21 |
22 |     strategy:
23 |       matrix:
24 |         node_version:
25 |           - 20
26 |
27 |     steps:
28 |       - name: Checkout
29 |         uses: actions/checkout@v3
30 |         with:
31 |           # “最近更新时间” 等 git 日志相关信息，需要拉取全部提交记录
32 |           fetch-depth: 0
33 |
34 |       - uses: pnpm/action-setup@v4
35 |         name: Install pnpm
36 |         with:
37 |           run_install: false
38 |
39 |       - name: Install Node.js (${{ matrix.node_version }})
40 |         uses: actions/setup-node@v4
41 |         with:
42 |           node-version: ${{ matrix.node_version }}
43 |           cache: 'pnpm'
44 |
45 |       - name: Install dependencies
46 |         run: pnpm install
47 |
48 |       - name: ESLint
49 |         run: pnpm lint:eslint
50 |
51 |       - name: Build project (MPA)
52 |         env:
53 |           NODE_OPTIONS: --max_old_space_size=4096
54 |         run: pnpm build-mpa
55 |

/.github/workflows/codeql-analysis.yml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | name: CodeQL
 2 |
 3 | on:
 4 |   push:
 5 |   pull_request:
 6 |     branches:
 7 |       - main
 8 |       - work
 9 |   schedule:
10 |     - cron: '30 7 * * 3'
11 |
12 | jobs:
13 |   analyze:
14 |     name: Analyze
15 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
16 |
17 |     strategy:
18 |       fail-fast: false
19 |       matrix:
20 |         language:
21 |           - javascript
22 |
23 |     steps:
24 |       - name: Checkout repository
25 |         uses: actions/checkout@v4
26 |
27 |       - name: Initialize CodeQL
28 |         uses: github/codeql-action/init@v3
29 |         with:
30 |           languages: ${{ matrix.language }}
31 |
32 |       - name: Auto Build
33 |         uses: github/codeql-action/autobuild@v3
34 |
35 |       - name: Perform CodeQL Analysis
36 |         uses: github/codeql-action/analyze@v3
37 |

 5 | # name: MAIN_PULL_REQUEST

 7 | # on:
 8 | #   pull_request:
 9 | #     branches: [develop, main]
10 | #     types: [opened, synchronize, reopened]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.github/workflows/issue-commented.yml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | name: ISSUE_COMMENTED
 2 |
 3 | on:
 4 |   issue_comment:
 5 |     types: [created]
 6 |
 7 | jobs:
 8 |   issue-commented:
 9 |     name: remove stale on commented
10 |     if: contains(github.event.issue.labels.*.name, 'stale')
11 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
12 |     steps:
13 |       - uses: actions-cool/issues-helper@v3
14 |         with:
15 |           actions: 'remove-labels'
16 |           token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
17 |           issue-number: ${{ github.event.issue.number }}
18 |           labels: 'stale'
19 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.github/workflows/issue-daily.yml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | name: ISSUE_DAILY
 2 |
 3 | on:
 4 |   schedule:
 5 |     - cron: '0 0 * * *'
 6 |
 7 | jobs:
 8 |   issue-label-stale:
 9 |     name: label stale issues
10 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
11 |     steps:
12 |       - uses: actions-cool/issues-helper@v3
13 |         with:
14 |           actions: 'check-inactive'
15 |           token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
16 |           inactive-day: 7
17 |           inactive-label: 'stale'
18 |           exclude-labels: 'bug, documentation, enhancement, feature, help wanted, need reproduction, stale'
19 |           body: |
20 |             This issue is marked as `stale` because it has not had recent activity. Issues marked with `stale` will be closed if they have no activity within 3 days.
21 |   issue-close-stale:
22 |     name: close stale issues
23 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
24 |     steps:
25 |       - uses: actions-cool/issues-helper@v3
26 |         with:
27 |           actions: 'close-issues'
28 |           token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
29 |           labels: 'stale'
30 |           inactive-day: 3
31 |
32 |   issue-close-need-reproduction:
33 |     name: close need-reproduction issues
34 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
35 |     steps:
36 |       - uses: actions-cool/issues-helper@v3
37 |         with:
38 |           actions: 'close-issues'
39 |           token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
40 |           labels: 'need reproduction'
41 |           inactive-day: 3
42 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.github/workflows/issue-labeled.yml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | name: ISSUE_LABELED
 2 |
 3 | on:
 4 |   issues:
 5 |     types: [labeled]
 6 |
 7 | jobs:
 8 |   issue-invalid:
 9 |     name: close invalid issue
10 |     if: github.event.label.name == 'invalid'
11 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
12 |     steps:
13 |       - uses: actions-cool/issues-helper@v3
14 |         with:
15 |           actions: 'close-issue, create-comment'
16 |           token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
17 |           body: |
18 |             Hello @${{ github.event.issue.user.login }}. This issue is marked as `invalid` and closed. Please follow the issue template.
19 |   issue-need-reproduction:
20 |     name: need reproduction
21 |     if: github.event.label.name == 'need reproduction'
22 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
23 |     steps:
24 |       - uses: actions-cool/issues-helper@v3
25 |         with:
26 |           actions: 'create-comment'
27 |           token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
28 |           body: |
29 |             Hello @${{ github.event.issue.user.login }}. Please provide a [minimal reproduction](https://stackoverflow.com/help/minimal-reproducible-example) using a GitHub repository or [codesandbox](https://codesandbox.io). Issues marked with `need reproduction` will be closed if they have no activity within 3 days.
30 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.github/workflows/links.yml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | name: LINKS
 2 |
 3 | on:
 4 |   push:
 5 |     branches:
 6 |       - dev
 7 |       - next
 8 |       - main
 9 |     paths-ignore:
10 |       - '**.md'
11 |   pull_request:
12 |     branches:
13 |       - dev
14 |       - next
15 |       - main
16 |   workflow_dispatch:
17 |   repository_dispatch:
18 |   schedule:
19 |     - cron: '00 18 * * *'
20 |
21 | jobs:
22 |   linkChecker:
23 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
24 |     steps:
25 |       - uses: actions/checkout@v3
26 |
27 |       - name: Link Checker
28 |         id: lychee
29 |         uses: lycheeverse/lychee-action@v1
30 |         env:
31 |           GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN}}
32 |
33 |       - name: Create Issue From File
34 |         if: steps.lychee.outputs.exit_code != 0
35 |         uses: peter-evans/create-issue-from-file@v4
36 |         with:
37 |           title: Link Checker Report
38 |           content-filepath: ./lychee/out.md
39 |           labels: report, automated issue
40 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.github/workflows/lunaria.yml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | name: LUNARIA
 2 |
 3 | on:
 4 |   # Trigger the workflow every time a pull request is opened or synchronized at the target `main` branch
 5 |   # Using a different branch name? Replace `main` with your branch’s name
 6 |   pull_request_target:
 7 |     types: [opened, synchronize]
 8 |     branches: [main]
 9 |
10 | # Allow this job to clone the repository and comment on the pull request
11 | permissions:
12 |   contents: read
13 |   pull-requests: write
14 |
15 | jobs:
16 |   lunaria-overview:
17 |     name: Generate Lunaria Overview
18 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
19 |
20 |     steps:
21 |       - name: Checkout
22 |         uses: actions/checkout@v4
23 |         with:
24 |           # Necessary for Lunaria to work properly
25 |           # Makes the action clone the entire git history
26 |           fetch-depth: 0
27 |
28 |       - uses: pnpm/action-setup@v4
29 |         name: Install pnpm
30 |         with:
31 |           run_install: false
32 |
33 |       - name: Install Node.js
34 |         uses: actions/setup-node@v4
35 |         with:
36 |           node-version: 20
37 |           cache: 'pnpm'
38 |
39 |       - name: Install dependencies
40 |         run: pnpm install
41 |
42 |       - name: Generate Lunaria Overview
43 |         uses: yanthomasdev/lunaria-action@v0.1.0
44 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.github/workflows/spelling.yml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | name: PRSPELLCHECK
 2 | on: [pull_request]
 3 | jobs:
 4 |   run:
 5 |     name: Spell Check with Typos
 6 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
 7 |     steps:
 8 |       - uses: actions/checkout@v3
 9 |       - name: Check spelling
10 |         uses: crate-ci/typos@master
11 |         with: { config: ./.github/_typos.toml }
12 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.github/workflows/test-build.yml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | name: TEST_BUILD
 2 |
 3 | on:
 4 |   workflow_call:
 5 |   pull_request:
 6 |     branches: [next, main]
 7 |     types: [opened, synchronize, reopened]
 8 |
 9 | jobs:
10 |   build:
11 |     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
12 |
13 |     strategy:
14 |       matrix:
15 |         node_version:
16 |           - 20
17 |
18 |     steps:
19 |       - uses: actions/checkout@main
20 |         with:
21 |           # “最近更新时间” 等 git 日志相关信息，需要拉取全部提交记录
22 |           fetch-depth: 0
23 |
24 |       - uses: pnpm/action-setup@v4
25 |         name: Install pnpm
26 |         with:
27 |           run_install: false
28 |
29 |       - name: Install Node.js
30 |         uses: actions/setup-node@v4
31 |         with:
32 |           node-version: 20
33 |           cache: 'pnpm'
34 |
35 |       - name: Install dependencies
36 |         run: pnpm install
37 |
38 |       # 构建
39 |       - name: Refresh Blog Data
40 |         run: pnpm build-blog
41 |
42 |       - name: Build
43 |         run: pnpm site:preview
44 |
45 |       - name: Build lunaria
46 |         run: pnpm lunaria:build
47 |
48 |       - run: |
49 |           zip -r _site.zip ./dist
50 |
51 |       - name: upload _site artifact
52 |         uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
53 |         with:
54 |           name: _site
55 |           path: _site.zip
56 |           retention-days: 5
57 |
58 |       - name: Save PR number
59 |         if: ${{ always() }}
60 |         run: echo ${{ github.event.number }} > ./pr-id.txt
61 |
62 |       - name: Upload PR number
63 |         if: ${{ always() }}
64 |         uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
65 |         with:
66 |           name: pr
67 |           path: ./pr-id.txt
68 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.husky/.gitignore:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | _
2 |

/.husky/commit-msg:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | #!/bin/sh
2 | . "$(dirname "$0")/_/husky.sh"
3 |
4 | pnpm commitlint --edit $1
5 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.husky/pre-commit:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | #!/bin/sh
2 | . "$(dirname "$0")/_/husky.sh"
3 |
4 | pnpm lint-staged
5 |

 1 | {
 2 |   "default": true,
 3 |   "MD003": {
 4 |     "style": "atx"
 5 |   },
 6 |   "MD004": {
 7 |     "style": "dash"
 8 |   },
 9 |   "MD013": false,
10 |   "MD024": {
11 |     "allow_different_nesting": true
12 |   },
13 |   "MD033": {
14 |     "allowed_elements": [
15 |       "br",
16 |       "script",
17 |       "Badge",
18 |       "CodePen",
19 |       "FontIcon",

25 |       "CodeGroup"
26 |     ]
27 |   },
28 |   "MD035": {
29 |     "style": "---"
30 |   },
31 |   "MD040": false,
32 |   "MD046": false,
33 |   "MD049": false
34 | }

/.pages.yml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | media:
2 |   input: src/public
3 |   output: /
4 | content:
5 |   - name: zh
6 |     label: src
7 |     type: collection
8 |     path: src
9 |

/.vitepress/config.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { fileURLToPath } from 'node:url'
 2 | import { defineConfig } from 'vitepress'
 3 |
 4 | import { generateBreadcrumbsData } from './config/breadcrumbsDataGenerator'
 5 | import { createConfigureFunction } from './config/common'
 6 | import { headConfig } from './config/head'
 7 | import { ignoreDeadLinksConfig } from './config/ignoreDeadLinks'
 8 | import { localesConfig } from './config/locales'
 9 | import { markdownConfig } from './config/markdown'
10 | import { rewritesConfig } from './config/rewrites'
11 | import { localeSearchConfig } from './config/search'
12 | import { sitemapConfig } from './config/sitemap'
13 |
14 | export default defineConfig({
15 |   srcDir: 'src',
16 |   outDir: './dist',
17 |   srcExclude: [],
18 |   scrollOffset: 'header',
19 |   cleanUrls: true,
20 |   lastUpdated: true,
21 |   title: '原神地图',
22 |   locales: localesConfig,
23 |   sitemap: sitemapConfig,
24 |   markdown: markdownConfig,
25 |   head: headConfig,
26 |   rewrites: rewritesConfig,
27 |   ignoreDeadLinks: ignoreDeadLinksConfig,
28 |   themeConfig: {
29 |     search: {
30 |       provider: 'local',
31 |       options: localeSearchConfig,
32 |     },
33 |   },
34 |   vite: {
35 |     configFile: fileURLToPath(import.meta.resolve('../vite.config.ts')),
36 |   },
37 |   ...createConfigureFunction(),
38 |   transformPageData(pageData, context) {
39 |     generateBreadcrumbsData(pageData, context)
40 |   },
41 | })
42 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/config/breadcrumbsDataGenerator.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { PageData, TransformPageContext } from 'vitepress'
 2 |
 3 | export function generateBreadcrumbsData(
 4 |   pageData: PageData,
 5 |   context: TransformPageContext,
 6 | ) {
 7 |   const splitPath = pageData.filePath.split('/')
 8 |   const rootDirectory = splitPath[0]
 9 |   const pages = context.siteConfig.pages
10 |
11 |   const breadcrumbs: {
12 |     title: string
13 |     link: string
14 |   }[] = [
15 |     {
16 |       title: context.siteConfig.site.title,
17 |       link: `/${rootDirectory}`,
18 |     },
19 |   ]
20 |
21 |   for (let i = 1; i < splitPath.length; i++) {
22 |     let link = ''
23 |     let encodedLink = ''
24 |     let title = splitPath[i]
25 |     if (i === splitPath.length - 1) {
26 |       title = pageData.title
27 |     }
28 |
29 |     for (let j = 0; j <= i; j++) {
30 |       link += `${splitPath[j]}`
31 |       encodedLink += `${encodeURIComponent(splitPath[j])}`
32 |
33 |       if (j !== i) {
34 |         link += `/`
35 |         encodedLink += `/`
36 |       }
37 |     }
38 |
39 |     if (!pages.includes(link) && !pages.includes(`${link}/index.md`)) {
40 |       breadcrumbs.push({ title: splitPath[i], link: '' })
41 |       continue
42 |     }
43 |
44 |     if (link.endsWith('index.md')) {
45 |       continue
46 |     }
47 |
48 |     if (link.endsWith('.md')) {
49 |       encodedLink = encodedLink.slice(0, -3)
50 |     }
51 |
52 |     breadcrumbs.push({ title, link: `/${encodedLink}` })
53 |   }
54 |
55 |   if (splitPath.length)
56 |     pageData.frontmatter.breadcrumbs = breadcrumbs
57 | }
58 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/config/common.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type {
 2 |   PageData,
 3 |   TransformContext,
 4 |   TransformPageContext,
 5 | } from 'vitepress'
 6 |
 7 | import type { ConfigureFuncType } from './types'
 8 | import { cfgDynamicHead } from './head'
 9 | import { cfgDynamicTitleTemplate } from './title'
10 | import { isProd } from './utils'
11 |
12 | export const hostname = 'https://yuanshen.site/docs'
13 |
14 | export function createConfigureFunction(): ConfigureFuncType {
15 |   if (isProd) {
16 |     return {
17 |       transformHead: (context: TransformContext) => {
18 |         const { pageData, siteConfig } = context
19 |         cfgDynamicHead(pageData, siteConfig)
20 |       },
21 |       transformPageData: (
22 |         pageData: PageData,
23 |         context: TransformPageContext,
24 |       ) => {
25 |         const { siteConfig } = context
26 |         cfgDynamicTitleTemplate(pageData, siteConfig)
27 |       },
28 |     }
29 |   }
30 |   return {
31 |     transformPageData: (pageData: PageData, context: TransformPageContext) => {
32 |       const { siteConfig } = context
33 |       cfgDynamicHead(pageData, siteConfig)
34 |       cfgDynamicTitleTemplate(pageData, siteConfig)
35 |     },
36 |   } as ConfigureFuncType
37 | }
38 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/config/ignoreDeadLinks.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | export const ignoreDeadLinksConfig = [
 2 |   // ignore exact url "/playground"
 3 |   '/playground',
 4 |   // ignore all localhost links
 5 |   /^https?:\/\/localhost/,
 6 |   // ignore all links include "/repl/""
 7 |   /\/repl\//,
 8 |   // custom function, ignore all links include "ignore"
 9 |   (url: string) => {
10 |     return url.toLowerCase().includes('ignore')
11 |   },
12 | ]
13 |

19 |     lang: 'ja-JP',
20 |     ...jaConfig,

/.vitepress/config/markdown.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { MarkdownOptions } from 'vitepress'
 2 | import { figure } from '@mdit/plugin-figure'
 3 |
 4 | import { imgSize, obsidianImageSize } from '@mdit/plugin-img-size'
 5 | import { mark } from '@mdit/plugin-mark'
 6 | import { spoiler } from '@mdit/plugin-spoiler'
 7 | import { sub } from '@mdit/plugin-sub'
 8 | import { sup } from '@mdit/plugin-sup'
 9 | import markdownItAttrs from 'markdown-it-attrs'
10 |
11 | import MarkdownItFootnote from 'markdown-it-footnote'
12 | import MarkdownItKbd from 'markdown-it-kbd-better'
13 | import { cardPlugin } from '../theme/markdown/card'
14 | import { colorPreviewPlugin } from '../theme/markdown/colorPreview'
15 | import customColor from '../theme/markdown/customColor'
16 | import lightbox from '../theme/markdown/lightbox'
17 | import { timeline } from '../theme/markdown/timeline'
18 | import variableInject from '../theme/markdown/variableInject'
19 |
20 | export const markdownConfig: MarkdownOptions = {
21 |   image: {
22 |     lazyLoading: true,
23 |   },
24 |   config(md) {
25 |     md.use(MarkdownItFootnote)
26 |     md.use(colorPreviewPlugin)
27 |     md.use(cardPlugin)
28 |     md.use(sub)
29 |     md.use(sup)
30 |     md.use(mark)
31 |     md.use(imgSize)
32 |     md.use(obsidianImageSize)
33 |     md.use(figure)
34 |     md.use(timeline)
35 |     md.use(spoiler)
36 |     md.use(lightbox)
37 |     md.use(variableInject)
38 |     md.use(customColor)
39 |     md.use(markdownItAttrs, {
40 |       allowedAttributes: ['id', 'class', 'thumbhash', /^regex.*$/],
41 |     })
42 |     md.use(MarkdownItKbd, {
43 |       presets: [
44 |         {
45 |           name: 'icons',
46 |         },
47 |       ],
48 |     })
49 |   },
50 | }
51 |

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/config/title.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { PageData, SiteConfig } from 'vitepress'
 2 | import type { CustomConfig } from '../locales/types'
 3 | import type { LocaleConfigVal } from './types'
 4 |
 5 | export function cfgDynamicTitleTemplate(
 6 |   pageData: PageData,
 7 |   siteConfig: SiteConfig,
 8 | ): void {
 9 |   let titleTemplate: boolean | string
10 |     = pageData.frontmatter.titleTemplate ?? siteConfig.userConfig.titleTemplate
11 |   if (titleTemplate === null || titleTemplate === undefined) {
12 |     const localeKey: string
13 |       = pageData.relativePath === pageData.filePath
14 |         ? pageData.relativePath.split('/', 1)[0]
15 |         : 'root'
16 |     const localeConfig: LocaleConfigVal
17 |       = siteConfig.userConfig.locales![localeKey] ?? {}
18 |     const templateMappings: CustomConfig['ui']['title']['templateMappings']
19 |       = localeConfig.themeConfig?.ui.title.templateMappings ?? []
20 |     for (const templateMapping of templateMappings) {
21 |       if (
22 |         templateMapping.test
23 |         && templateMapping.test.test(pageData.relativePath)
24 |       ) {
25 |         titleTemplate = templateMapping.template
26 |         break
27 |       }
28 |     }
29 |   }
30 |   pageData.titleTemplate = titleTemplate
31 | }
32 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/config/types.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { DefaultTheme, LocaleSpecificConfig, UserConfig } from 'vitepress'
 2 | import type { CustomConfig } from '../locales/types'
 3 |
 4 | export type ConfigureFuncType = Pick<
 5 |   UserConfig<DefaultTheme.Config>,
 6 |   'transformHead' | 'transformPageData'
 7 | >
 8 |
 9 | export type LocaleConfigVal = LocaleSpecificConfig<
10 |   CustomConfig & DefaultTheme.Config
11 | >
12 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/config/utils.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { PageData, SiteConfig } from 'vitepress'
 2 |
 3 | // eslint-disable-next-line node/prefer-global/process
 4 | export const isProd = process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production'
 5 |
 6 | export function cfgGetPageUrl(
 7 |   pageData: PageData,
 8 |   siteConfig: SiteConfig,
 9 | ): string {
10 |   return `https://yuanshen.site/${siteConfig.site.base}${pageData.relativePath.replace('.md', '')}`
11 | }
12 |
13 | export function cfgGetPageTitle(pageData: PageData, _siteConfig?: SiteConfig<unknown>): string {
14 |   return pageData.frontmatter.title
15 |     ? pageData.frontmatter.title
16 |     : 'Kongying Tavern'
17 | }
18 | export function cfgGetPageDesc(pageData: PageData, _siteConfig?: SiteConfig<unknown>): string {
19 |   return pageData.frontmatter.description
20 |     ? pageData.frontmatter.description
21 |     : `Genshin Interactive Map\nA Completionist's Interactive Map by Kongying Tavern`
22 | }
23 | export function cfgGetPageKeywords(pageData: PageData, _siteConfig: SiteConfig<unknown>): string {
24 |   return pageData.frontmatter.keywords
25 |     ? pageData.frontmatter.keywords
26 |     : '空荧酒馆,空荧地图,空荧酒馆原神地图,原神全资源攻略地图,原神攻略地图,原神地图,原神电子地图,原神互动地图,Genshin,Genshin_map,Genshin_Treasure,Genshin Map,Genshin Impact Map,Genshin Impact Interactive Map'
27 | }
28 | export function cfgGetPageCover(pageData: PageData, _siteConfig: SiteConfig<unknown>): string {
29 |   return pageData.frontmatter.image
30 |     ? pageData.frontmatter.image
31 |     : 'https://yuanshen.site/docs/imgs/common/cover.jpg'
32 | }
33 |

/.vitepress/locales/ja/head.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { LocaleSpecificConfig } from 'vitepress'
 2 | import C from './constants'
 3 |
 4 | const head: LocaleSpecificConfig['head'] = [
 5 |   ['meta', { name: 'keywords', content: C.META_KEYWORDS }],
 6 |   ['meta', { property: 'og:url', content: C.META_URL }],
 7 |   ['meta', { property: 'og:description', content: C.META_DESCRIPTION }],
 8 |   ['meta', { property: 'twitter:url', content: C.META_URL }],
 9 |   ['meta', { property: 'twitter:title', content: C.META_TITLE }],
10 |   ['meta', { property: 'twitter:description', content: C.META_DESCRIPTION }],
11 |   ['meta', { property: 'og:site_name', content: C.META_TITLE }],
12 |   ['meta', { property: 'og:locale', content: C.LOCAL_CODE }],
13 |   [
14 |     'meta',
15 |     {
16 |       property: 'og:image',
17 |       content: C.META_IMAGE,
18 |     },
19 |   ],
20 |   [
21 |     'meta',
22 |     {
23 |       name: 'twitter:image',
24 |       content: C.META_IMAGE,
25 |     },
26 |   ],
27 | ]
28 |
29 | export default head
30 |

/.vitepress/locales/ja/index.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { DefaultTheme, LocaleSpecificConfig } from 'vitepress'
 2 | import type { CustomConfig } from '../types'
 3 | import { baseHelper } from '../../theme/utils'
 4 | import _404 from './404'
 5 | import AsideLinks from './aside-links'
 6 | import Changelog from './changelog'
 7 | import C from './constants'
 8 | import docReaction from './docs-feedback'
 9 | import Footer from './footer'
10 | import Forum from './forum'
11 | import Head from './head'
12 | import Nav from './nav'
13 | import Payment from './payment'
14 | import Sidebar from './sidebar'
15 | import Staff from './staff'
16 |
17 | import Team from './team'
18 | import UI from './ui'
19 |
20 | export const jaConfig: LocaleSpecificConfig<
21 |   CustomConfig & DefaultTheme.Config
22 | > = {
23 |   title: '原神マップ',
24 |   titleTemplate: ':title | 空蛍酒場',
25 |   description: C.META_DESCRIPTION,
26 |   head: Head,
27 |   themeConfig: {
28 |     siteTitle: C.META_TITLE,
29 |     keyword: C.META_KEYWORDS,
30 |     description: C.META_DESCRIPTION,
31 |     image: C.META_IMAGE,
32 |     logo: '/imgs/common/logo/logo_256.png',
33 |
34 |     outlineTitle: 'このページでは',
35 |     lastUpdatedText: '更新日時',
36 |     returnToTopLabel: '回到顶部',
37 |     langMenuLabel: '更改语言',
38 |     notFound: _404,
39 |     ui: UI,
40 |     asideLinks: AsideLinks,
41 |     docReaction,
42 |     forum: Forum,
43 |     docFooter: {
44 |       prev: '前へ',
45 |       next: '次へ',
46 |     },
47 |
48 |     staff: Staff,
49 |     team: Team,
50 |     payment: Payment,
51 |     changelog: Changelog,
52 |
53 |     nav: baseHelper(Nav, C.LOCAL_BASE),
54 |     sidebar: baseHelper(Sidebar, C.LOCAL_BASE),
55 |     footer: baseHelper(Footer, C.LOCAL_BASE),
56 |   },
57 | }

 5 |     templateMappings: [
 6 |       {
 7 |         test: /(^|\/?)manual\/client\/?/,
 8 |         template: ':title - 客户端使用手册 | 空荧酒馆',
 9 |       },
10 |     ],
11 |   },
12 |   banner: {
13 |     wip: '此页面正在施工中，不代表最终效果。',
14 |   },
15 |   button: {
16 |     search: '搜索',
17 |     submit: '提交',
18 |     cancel: '取消',
19 |     loading: '加载中',
20 |     close: '关闭',
21 |     all: '全部',
22 |   },
23 | }
24 |
25 | export default ui
26 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/plugins/open-in-editor/index.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { Plugin } from 'vite'
 2 | import openEditor from 'open-editor'
 3 |
 4 | export default function openInEditorPlugin(): Plugin {
 5 |   return {
 6 |     name: 'vite-plugin-open-in-editor',
 7 |
 8 |     configureServer(server) {
 9 |       server.middlewares.use('/__open-in-editor', async (req, res, next) => {
10 |         if (!req.url)
11 |           return next()
12 |
13 |         try {
14 |           const params = new URL(req.url, 'http://a.com').searchParams
15 |           const file = params.get('file')
16 |
17 |           if (!file)
18 |             return next()
19 |
20 |           const line = Number.parseInt(params.get('line') || '1', 10)
21 |           const column = Number.parseInt(params.get('column') || '1', 10)
22 |
23 |           await openEditor([{ file, line, column }])
24 |           res.statusCode = 204
25 |         }
26 |         catch (err) {
27 |           console.error('Failed to open in editor:', err)
28 |           res.statusCode = 500
29 |           res.end('Failed to open in editor')
30 |           return
31 |         }
32 |
33 |         res.end()
34 |       })
35 |     },
36 |   }
37 | }
38 |

 1 | export const GITEE_API_CONFIG = {
 2 |   PREFIX_URL: 'https://gitee.com/',
 3 |   ENDPOINT_PREFIX: 'api/v5/',
 4 |   CLIENT_ID: '053290d8af24515ea1ba7aa9d19175698eef3be29ada8a6a3156804093a21c4d',
 5 |   CLIENT_SECRET:
 6 |     '490930078ce5da2580a193af163c275c670567e70a93fbe0ca39e15faa8f5271',
 7 |   OWNER: 'KYJGYSDT',
 8 |   FEEDBACK_REPO: 'Feedback',
 9 |   BLOG_REPO: 'Blog',
10 |   TOPIC_TYPE: ['BUG', 'FEAT', 'ANN'],
11 |   STATE_TAGS: new Set(['DEV-TEST', 'CLOSED', 'WEB-FEEDBACK', 'GOOD-ISSUE']),
12 | }

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/apis/forum/gitee/hooks.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { BeforeErrorHook } from 'ky'
 2 | import type { ErrorHandler } from './types'
 3 | import { GiteeApiErrorType } from './types'
 4 | import { parseErrorMessage } from './utils'
 5 |
 6 | const errorHandlers: ErrorHandler[] = [
 7 |   {
 8 |     match: 'Rate Limit Exceeded',
 9 |     state: [401, 403],
10 |     errorName: GiteeApiErrorType.RateLimitExceeded,
11 |     getErrorMessage: () => 'Rate limit exceeded',
12 |   },
13 |   {
14 |     match: '401 Unauthorized',
15 |     state: [401],
16 |     errorName: GiteeApiErrorType.Unauthorized,
17 |     getErrorMessage: (text: string) => text.trim(),
18 |   },
19 | ]
20 |
21 | const handleApiErrors: BeforeErrorHook = async (error) => {
22 |   const { response } = error
23 |   if (!response)
24 |     return error
25 |
26 |   const errorText = await parseErrorMessage(response)
27 |   if (!errorText)
28 |     return error
29 |
30 |   const [errorType, errorMessage = ''] = errorText.split(':')
31 |   const handler = errorHandlers.find(
32 |     h => h.state.includes(response.status) && errorType.includes(h.match),
33 |   )
34 |
35 |   if (handler) {
36 |     error.name = handler.errorName
37 |     error.message = handler.getErrorMessage(errorMessage)
38 |   }
39 |
40 |   return error
41 | }
42 |
43 | export const beforeErrorHooks: BeforeErrorHook[] = [handleApiErrors]
44 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/apis/forum/gitee/inBrowserUtils.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type ForumAPI from '../api'
 2 | import { useRuleChecks } from '~/composables/useRuleChecks'
 3 | import { normalizeComment } from './utils'
 4 |
 5 | export function extractOfficialAndAuthorComments(
 6 |   issue: GITEE.IssueInfo,
 7 |   commentList: GITEE.CommentList,
 8 | ): ForumAPI.Comment[] | null {
 9 |   const comments: ForumAPI.Comment[] = []
10 |   const relatedComments = commentList.filter(
11 |     comment => comment.target.issue.id === issue.id,
12 |   )
13 |   // 查找作者的评论
14 |   const authorComment = relatedComments.find(
15 |     comment => comment.user.id === issue.user.id,
16 |   )
17 |   // 查找官方团队的评论
18 |   const officialComment = relatedComments.find((comment) => {
19 |     const { hasAnyRoles } = useRuleChecks(comment.user.id)
20 |     return hasAnyRoles('teamMember', 'feedbackMember').value
21 |   })
22 |
23 |   if (authorComment)
24 |     comments.push(normalizeComment(authorComment))
25 |   if (officialComment)
26 |     comments.push(normalizeComment(officialComment))
27 |
28 |   return comments.length > 0 ? comments : null
29 | }
30 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/apis/forum/gitee/labels.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { apiCall } from '.'
 2 | import { GITEE_API_CONFIG } from './config'
 3 | import { filterWhitelistTags } from './utils'
 4 |
 5 | export async function getAllLabels(
 6 |   useCache = true,
 7 | ): Promise<GITEE.IssueLabel[]> {
 8 |   return (
 9 |     await apiCall<GITEE.IssueLabel[]>(
10 |       'get',
11 |       `repos/${GITEE_API_CONFIG.OWNER}/${GITEE_API_CONFIG.FEEDBACK_REPO}/labels`,
12 |       {
13 |         useCache,
14 |       },
15 |     )
16 |   )[0]
17 | }
18 |
19 | export async function getAllLabelsName(): Promise<string[]> {
20 |   const data = await getAllLabels()
21 |   return filterWhitelistTags(data)
22 | }
23 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/apis/forum/gitee/password.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type ForumAPI from '../api'
 2 | import { catchError } from '@/apis/utils'
 3 | import { fetcher } from '.'
 4 | import { GITEE_API_CONFIG } from './config'
 5 | import { normalizeAuth } from './utils'
 6 |
 7 | export async function getToken(
 8 |   username: string,
 9 |   password: string,
10 |   scope: string[] = ['user_info', 'issues', 'notes'],
11 | ): Promise<[undefined, ForumAPI.Auth] | [Error, undefined]> {
12 |   const [error, data] = await catchError(
13 |     fetcher
14 |       .post<Promise<GITEE.Auth>>('oauth/token', {
15 |         headers: {
16 |           ContentType: 'application/x-www-forum-urlencoded',
17 |         },
18 |         json: {
19 |           grant_type: 'password',
20 |           client_id: GITEE_API_CONFIG.CLIENT_ID,
21 |           client_secret: GITEE_API_CONFIG.CLIENT_SECRET,
22 |           scope: scope.join(' '),
23 |           username,
24 |           password,
25 |         },
26 |       })
27 |       .json(),
28 |   )
29 |
30 |   if (error)
31 |     return [new Error(`Can not get token: ${error.message}`), undefined]
32 |
33 |   return [undefined, normalizeAuth(await data)]
34 | }
35 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/apis/forum/gitee/types.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { Hooks } from 'ky'
 2 | import type ForumAPI from '../api'
 3 |
 4 | export enum GiteeApiErrorType {
 5 |   RateLimitExceeded = 'Rate Limit Exceeded',
 6 |   MissingPaginationParams = 'Missing Pagination Params',
 7 |   Unauthorized = 'Unauthorized',
 8 |   ApiError = 'Gitee Api Error',
 9 | }
10 |
11 | export type HttpMethod = 'get' | 'post' | 'patch' | 'delete'
12 |
13 | export interface ApiCallParams {
14 |   params?: Record<string, any>
15 |   body?: Record<string, any>
16 |   hooks?: Hooks
17 |   useCache?: boolean
18 | }
19 |
20 | export type ApiCallResult<T> = Promise<
21 |   [T, undefined] | [T, ForumAPI.PaginationParams]
22 | >
23 |
24 | export interface ErrorHandler {
25 |   match: string
26 |   state: number[]
27 |   errorName: GiteeApiErrorType
28 |   getErrorMessage: (text: string) => string
29 | }
30 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/apis/forum/webhook/index.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import ky from 'ky'
 2 |
 3 | import { catchError } from '../../utils'
 4 | import { GITEE_API_CONFIG } from '../gitee/config'
 5 |
 6 | export const PREFIX_URL = 'https://api.yuanshen.site/webhook/'
 7 | export const WEBHOOK_TOKEN = '4c0001c8-dec1-4c13-a689-4cbcd7d156ae'
 8 | export const fetcher = ky.create({
 9 |   prefixUrl: PREFIX_URL,
10 |   timeout: 8000,
11 |   retry: 2,
12 | })
13 |
14 | export async function reformat(
15 |   options: GITEE_WEBHOOK.OPTIONS,
16 | ): Promise<[undefined, GITEE_WEBHOOK.PARAMS] | [Error, undefined]> {
17 |   const {
18 |     repo = GITEE_API_CONFIG.FEEDBACK_REPO,
19 |     owner = GITEE_API_CONFIG.OWNER,
20 |     number,
21 |   } = options
22 |   const [error, response] = await catchError(
23 |     fetcher.post<GITEE_WEBHOOK.PARAMS>('gitee/feedback/reformat', {
24 |       json: {
25 |         webhook_token: WEBHOOK_TOKEN,
26 |         owner,
27 |         repo,
28 |         number,
29 |       },
30 |     }),
31 |   )
32 |
33 |   if (error)
34 |     return Promise.reject(error)
35 |
36 |   const data = await response.json()
37 |
38 |   return [error, data]
39 | }
40 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/apis/forum/webhook/typings.d.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | declare namespace GITEE_WEBHOOK {
 2 |   interface OPTIONS {
 3 |     owner?: string
 4 |     repo?: string
 5 |     number: string | number
 6 |   }
 7 |
 8 |   interface PARAMS {
 9 |     rawContent: string
10 |     sanitizedContent: string
11 |     json: Record<string, unknown>
12 |   }
13 | }
14 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/apis/inter-knot.site/index.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { useUserAuthStore } from '@/stores/useUserAuth'
 2 | import { useUserInfoStore } from '@/stores/useUserInfo'
 3 | import ky, { HTTPError } from 'ky'
 4 | import * as oauth from './oauth'
 5 | import * as reactions from './reactions'
 6 | import * as translate from './translate'
 7 | import * as upload from './upload'
 8 |
 9 | export const PREFIX_URL = 'https://hub.inter-knot.site/api/'
10 |
11 | export const fetcher = ky.create({
12 |   prefixUrl: PREFIX_URL,
13 |   timeout: 10000,
14 |   retry: 2,
15 |   hooks: {
16 |     beforeRequest: [
17 |       async (request) => {
18 |         if (import.meta.env.SSR)
19 |           return
20 |         const userInfo = useUserInfoStore()
21 |         const userAuth = useUserAuthStore()
22 |
23 |         if (!userInfo.fingerprint)
24 |           await userInfo.refreshFingerprint()
25 |         request.headers.set('Fingerprint', ` ${userInfo.fingerprint?.visitorId}`)
26 |
27 |         if (userAuth.isSSOTokenValid('interKnot').value && userAuth.ssoAuth.interKnot.accessToken)
28 |           request.headers.set('Authorization', `Bearer ${userAuth.ssoAuth.interKnot.accessToken}`)
29 |       },
30 |     ],
31 |     beforeRetry: [
32 |       async ({ error }) => {
33 |         if (import.meta.env.SSR)
34 |           return
35 |
36 |         if (error instanceof HTTPError && error.response.status === 401) {
37 |           const userAuth = useUserAuthStore()
38 |           if (userAuth.isTokenValid && !userAuth.isSSOTokenValid('interKnot').value) {
39 |             await userAuth.refreshSSOAuth('interKnot')
40 |           }
41 |         }
42 |       },
43 |     ],
44 |   },
45 | })
46 |
47 | export { oauth, reactions, translate, upload }
48 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/apis/inter-knot.site/oauth.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { SSOAuth } from '@/stores/useUserAuth'
 2 | import type { INTER_KNOT } from './api'
 3 | import { fetcher } from '.'
 4 | import { catchError } from '../utils'
 5 | import { generateRandomString, normalizeSSOAuth, signToken } from './utils'
 6 |
 7 | export async function refreshToken(accessToken: string): Promise<[null, SSOAuth] | [Error, null]> {
 8 |   const nonce = generateRandomString(16)
 9 |   const signedToken = await signToken(accessToken, nonce)
10 |
11 |   const [error, auth] = await catchError<INTER_KNOT.AuthResponse>(fetcher.post('sso/refresh-token', { json: { token: accessToken, provider: 'gitee', signature: signedToken, nonce } }).json())
12 |   if (error)
13 |     return [error, null]
14 |   return [null, normalizeSSOAuth(auth)]
15 | }
16 |
17 | export async function logout(accessToken?: string): Promise<[null, INTER_KNOT.LogoutResponse] | [Error, null]> {
18 |   const [error, data] = await catchError<INTER_KNOT.LogoutResponse>(fetcher.get('sso/logout', {
19 |     headers: {
20 |       ...(accessToken ? { Authorization: `Bearer ${accessToken}` } : {}),
21 |     },
22 |   }).json())
23 |   if (error)
24 |     return [error, null]
25 |   return [null, data]
26 | }
27 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/apis/inter-knot.site/reactions.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { INTER_KNOT } from './api'
 2 | import { fetcher } from '.'
 3 |
 4 | export async function getPageReaction(userId?: string): Promise<INTER_KNOT.ReactionResponse | null> {
 5 |   if (import.meta.env.SSR)
 6 |     return null
 7 |   return fetcher
 8 |     .get('reactions', {
 9 |       searchParams: {
10 |         ...(userId ? { userId } : {}),
11 |       },
12 |     })
13 |     .json()
14 | }
15 |
16 | export async function setPageReaction(action: 'like' | 'dislike' | 'revoke', userId?: string): Promise<INTER_KNOT.ReactionResponse | null> {
17 |   if (import.meta.env.SSR)
18 |     return null
19 |   return fetcher
20 |     .get('reactions/add', {
21 |       searchParams: {
22 |         action,
23 |         ...(userId ? { userId } : {}),
24 |       },
25 |     })
26 |     .json()
27 | }
28 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/apis/inter-knot.site/translate.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { INTER_KNOT } from './api'
 2 | import { fetcher } from '.'
 3 |
 4 | export async function translate(text: string, targetLanguage?: string, sourceLanguage?: string): Promise<INTER_KNOT.TranslateResponse | null> {
 5 |   if (import.meta.env.SSR)
 6 |     return null
 7 |   return fetcher
 8 |     .get('translate', {
 9 |       searchParams: {
10 |         text,
11 |         ...(targetLanguage ? { targetLanguage } : {}),
12 |         ...(sourceLanguage ? { sourceLanguage } : {}),
13 |       },
14 |     })
15 |     .json()
16 | }
17 |
18 | export async function getLanguages(): Promise<INTER_KNOT.LanguageResponse | null> {
19 |   if (import.meta.env.SSR)
20 |     return null
21 |   return fetcher.get('translate/languages').json()
22 | }
23 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/apis/inter-knot.site/upload.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type ForumAPI from '../forum/api'
 2 | import type { INTER_KNOT } from './api'
 3 | import { fetcher } from '.'
 4 | import { catchError } from '../utils'
 5 | import { normalizeImage } from './utils'
 6 |
 7 | export async function uploadImg(
 8 |   rawFile: File,
 9 | ): Promise<ForumAPI.Image> {
10 |   const formData = new FormData()
11 |   formData.append('file', rawFile)
12 |
13 |   const [error, response] = await catchError(
14 |     fetcher.post<INTER_KNOT.ImageResponse>('images/upload', {
15 |       body: formData,
16 |     }),
17 |   )
18 |
19 |   if (error)
20 |     return Promise.reject(error)
21 |
22 |   const data = await response.json()
23 |
24 |   return normalizeImage(data)
25 | }
26 |

/.vitepress/theme/components/DocHeader.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import { useData } from 'vitepress'
 3 | import { computed } from 'vue'
 4 |
 5 | import DocsBreadCrumb from './DocsBreadCrumb.vue'
 6 |
 7 | const { frontmatter, page } = useData()
 8 |
 9 | const title = computed(
10 |   () =>
11 |     frontmatter.value.title
12 |     || page.value.title
13 |     || page.value.relativePath.replace('.md', ''),
14 | )
15 | </script>
16 |
17 | <template>
18 |   <div
19 |     v-if="frontmatter.docHeader !== false && frontmatter.layout === 'doc'"
20 |     class="slide-enter docs-header relative mb-4 border-b-color-[var(--vp-c-divider)] border-b-solid"
21 |   >
22 |     <DocsBreadCrumb
23 |       class="mb-3 flex items-center gap-1.5 text-sm/6 text-primary font-semibold"
24 |     />
25 |     <div class="flex flex-col items-start gap-6 lg:flex-row">
26 |       <div class="flex-1">
27 |         <div
28 |           class="flex flex-col lg:flex-row lg:items-center lg:justify-between"
29 |         >
30 |           <h1
31 |             class="text-3xl text-gray-900 font-bold tracking-tight sm:text-4xl dark:text-white"
32 |           >
33 |             {{ title }}
34 |           </h1>
35 |         </div>
36 |         <p
37 |           v-if="frontmatter.description"
38 |           class="mt-4 text-lg text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400"
39 |           v-html="frontmatter.description"
40 |         />
41 |       </div>
42 |     </div>
43 |   </div>
44 | </template>
45 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/components/DocsBreadCrumb.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import {
 3 |   Breadcrumb,
 4 |   BreadcrumbItem,
 5 |   BreadcrumbLink,
 6 |   BreadcrumbList,
 7 |   BreadcrumbSeparator,
 8 | } from '@/components/ui/breadcrumb'
 9 | import { useData, useRouter } from 'vitepress'
10 | import { computed } from 'vue'
11 |
12 | const { frontmatter, theme } = useData()
13 | const { go } = useRouter()
14 |
15 | const breadcrumbs = computed(
16 |   () =>
17 |     (frontmatter.value.breadcrumbs ?? []) as {
18 |       title: string
19 |       link: string
20 |     }[],
21 | )
22 | </script>
23 |
24 | <template>
25 |   <Breadcrumb v-if="breadcrumbs.length > 1">
26 |     <BreadcrumbList>
27 |       <template
28 |         v-for="(breadcrumb, index) in breadcrumbs"
29 |         :key="breadcrumb.title"
30 |       >
31 |         <BreadcrumbItem>
32 |           <BreadcrumbLink
33 |             class="font-[var(--vp-font-family-subtitle)] capitalize"
34 |             href="#"
35 |             :class="{ 'text-foreground': index === breadcrumbs.length - 1 }"
36 |             @click="go(breadcrumb.link)"
37 |           >
38 |             {{ index === 0 ? theme.siteTitle : breadcrumb.title }}
39 |           </BreadcrumbLink>
40 |         </BreadcrumbItem>
41 |         <BreadcrumbSeparator v-if="index !== breadcrumbs.length - 1" />
42 |       </template>
43 |     </BreadcrumbList>
44 |   </Breadcrumb>
45 | </template>
46 |

/.vitepress/theme/components/LoginAlertDialog.vue:

 2 | import {
 3 |   AlertDialog,

15 |

19 | const { redirectAuth: login } = useLogin()
20 | </script>

24 |     <AlertDialogContent class="max-w-[clamp(30vw,400px,90vw)] rounded-md">

 7 |   ([key, value]) =>
 8 |     ({
 9 |       key,

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/components/type.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | export function mutable<T extends readonly any[] | Record<string, unknown>>(
 2 |   val: T,
 3 | ) {
 4 |   return val as Mutable<typeof val>
 5 | }
 6 |
 7 | export function NOOP() {}
 8 |
 9 | export type Mutable<T> = { -readonly [P in keyof T]: T[P] }
10 |
11 | export type HTMLElementCustomized<T> = HTMLElement & T
12 |
13 | /**
14 |  * @deprecated stop to use null
15 |  * @see {@link https://github.com/sindresorhus/meta/discussions/7}
16 |  */
17 | export type Nullable<T> = T | null
18 |
19 | export type Arrayable<T> = T | T[]
20 | export type Awaitable<T> = Promise<T> | T
21 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/AsyncButton.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import { ReloadIcon } from '@radix-icons/vue'
 3 | import { ref, useAttrs } from 'vue'
 4 |
 5 | import { Button } from './button'
 6 |
 7 | defineOptions({
 8 |   inheritAttrs: false,
 9 | })
10 |
11 | const attrs = useAttrs()
12 | const loading = ref(false)
13 |
14 | async function onClick() {
15 |   loading.value = true
16 |   try {
17 |     if (typeof attrs?.onClick === 'function') {
18 |       await attrs.onClick()
19 |     }
20 |   }
21 |   finally {
22 |     loading.value = false
23 |   }
24 | }
25 | </script>
26 |
27 | <template>
28 |   <div>
29 |     <Button :disabled="loading" v-bind="$attrs" @click="onClick">
30 |       <ReloadIcon v-if="loading" class="mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin" />
31 |       <slot />
32 |     </Button>
33 |   </div>
34 | </template>
35 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/BlurFade.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang='ts'>
 2 | interface BlurFadeProps {
 3 |   class?: string
 4 |   variant?: {
 5 |     hidden: { y: number }
 6 |     visible: { y: number }
 7 |     enter: { y: number }
 8 |   }
 9 |   duration?: number
10 |   delay?: number
11 |   yOffset?: number
12 |   inView?: boolean
13 |   blur?: string
14 |   inViewMargin?: string
15 | };
16 |
17 | const props = withDefaults(defineProps<BlurFadeProps>(), {
18 |   duration: 0.4,
19 |   delay: 500,
20 |   yOffset: 6,
21 |   inView: false,
22 |   inViewMargin: '-50px',
23 |   blur: '6px',
24 | })
25 | const defaultVariants = {
26 |   hidden: { y: props.yOffset, opacity: 0, filter: `blur(${props.blur})` },
27 |   visible: {
28 |     y: -props.yOffset,
29 |     opacity: 1,
30 |     filter: 'blur(0px)',
31 |     transition: {
32 |       delay: 0.04 + props.delay,
33 |       duration: 500,
34 |       ease: 'easeIn',
35 |     },
36 |   },
37 |   enter: {
38 |     y: -props.yOffset,
39 |     opacity: 1,
40 |     transition: {
41 |       delay: 0.04 + props.delay,
42 |       duration: 500,
43 |       ease: 'easeIn',
44 |     },
45 |     filter: 'blur(0px)',
46 |   },
47 | }
48 |
49 | const combinedVariants = props.variant || defaultVariants
50 | </script>
51 |
52 | <template>
53 |   <div
54 |     v-motion :initial="combinedVariants.hidden" :visible="props.inView ? combinedVariants.visible : undefined"
55 |     :enter="!props.inView ? combinedVariants.enter : undefined" :class="props.class"
56 |   >
57 |     <slot />
58 |   </div>
59 | </template>
60 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/LinkGrid.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import { withBase } from 'vitepress'
 3 |
 4 | defineProps<{
 5 |   items: Integration[]
 6 | }>()
 7 |
 8 | interface Integration {
 9 |   icon: string
10 |   name: string
11 |   link: string
12 |   target?: string
13 |   secondary?: string
14 | }
15 | </script>
16 |
17 | <template>
18 |   <div class="slide-enter flex flex-wrap gap-4">
19 |     <a
20 |       v-for="item of items"
21 |       :key="item.name"
22 |       :href="item.link"
23 |       :target="item.target"
24 |       :title="withBase(item.link)"
25 |       class="Link h-30 w-30 flex flex-col items-center justify-center text-center text-inherit"
26 |     >
27 |       <div
28 |         v-if="item.icon.startsWith('i')"
29 |         :class="item.icon"
30 |         class="mb2 h-10 w-10"
31 |       />
32 |       <img
33 |         v-else
34 |         :src="withBase(item.icon)"
35 |         class="no-zoomable mb-2 h-10 w-10"
36 |       >
37 |       <span class="text-sm font-[var(--vp-font-family-subtitle)]">{{
38 |         item.name
39 |       }}</span>
40 |       <span class="text-xs opacity-50">{{ item.secondary }}</span>
41 |     </a>
42 |   </div>
43 | </template>
44 |
45 | <style scoped>
46 | .Link {
47 |   color: inherit !important;
48 |   text-decoration: none !important;
49 |   border: 1px solid var(--vp-c-bg-soft);
50 |   border-radius: 12px;
51 |   background-color: var(--vp-c-bg-soft);
52 |   transition:
53 |     border-color 0.25s,
54 |     background-color 0.25s;
55 | }
56 |
57 | .Link:hover {
58 |   color: var(--vp-c-brand) !important;
59 |   border-color: var(--vp-c-brand) !important;
60 | }
61 | </style>
62 |

/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/accordion/Accordion.vue:

 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import type { AccordionRootEmits, AccordionRootProps } from 'radix-vue'
 3 | import { AccordionRoot, useForwardPropsEmits } from 'radix-vue'
 4 |
 5 | const props = defineProps<AccordionRootProps>()
 6 | const emits = defineEmits<AccordionRootEmits>()
 7 |
 8 | const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(props, emits)
 9 | </script>
10 |
11 | <template>
12 |   <AccordionRoot v-bind="forwarded">
13 |     <slot />
14 |   </AccordionRoot>
15 | </template>
16 |

/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/accordion/AccordionContent.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import type { AccordionContentProps } from 'radix-vue'
 3 | import type { HTMLAttributes } from 'vue'
 4 | import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'
 5 | import { AccordionContent } from 'radix-vue'
 6 | import { computed } from 'vue'
 7 |
 8 | const props = defineProps<
 9 |   AccordionContentProps & { class?: HTMLAttributes['class'] }
10 | >()
11 |
12 | const delegatedProps = computed(() => {
13 |   const { class: _, ...delegated } = props
14 |
15 |   return delegated
16 | })
17 | </script>
18 |
19 | <template>
20 |   <AccordionContent
21 |     v-bind="delegatedProps"
22 |     class="overflow-hidden text-sm data-[state=open]:animate-accordion-down data-[state=closed]:animate-accordion-up"
23 |   >
24 |     <div :class="cn('pb-4 pt-0', props.class)">
25 |       <slot />
26 |     </div>
27 |   </AccordionContent>
28 | </template>

 2 | import type { AccordionItemProps } from 'radix-vue'
 3 | import type { HTMLAttributes } from 'vue'
 4 | import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'
 5 | import { AccordionItem, useForwardProps } from 'radix-vue'
 6 | import { computed } from 'vue'
 7 |
 8 | const props = defineProps<
 9 |   AccordionItemProps & { class?: HTMLAttributes['class'] }
10 | >()
11 |
12 | const delegatedProps = computed(() => {
13 |   const { class: _, ...delegated } = props
14 |
15 |   return delegated
16 | })
17 |
18 | const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(delegatedProps)
19 | </script>
20 |
21 | <template>
22 |   <AccordionItem v-bind="forwardedProps" :class="cn('border-b', props.class)">
23 |     <slot />
24 |   </AccordionItem>

/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/badge/index.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { VariantProps } from 'class-variance-authority'
 2 | import { cva } from 'class-variance-authority'
 3 |
 4 | export { default as Badge } from './Badge.vue'
 5 |
 6 | // @unocss-include
 7 | export const badgeVariants = cva(
 8 |   'inline-flex items-center rounded-md border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2',
 9 |   {
10 |     variants: {
11 |       variant: {
12 |         default:
13 |           'border-transparent bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow hover:bg-primary/80',
14 |         secondary:
15 |           'border-transparent bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80',
16 |         destructive:
17 |           'border-transparent bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground shadow hover:bg-destructive/80',
18 |         outline: 'text-foreground',
19 |       },
20 |     },
21 |     defaultVariants: {
22 |       variant: 'default',
23 |     },
24 |   },
25 | )
26 |
27 | export type BadgeVariants = VariantProps<typeof badgeVariants>
28 |

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/button/Button.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import type { PrimitiveProps } from 'radix-vue'
 3 | import type { HTMLAttributes } from 'vue'
 4 | import type { ButtonVariants } from '.'
 5 | import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'
 6 | import { Primitive } from 'radix-vue'
 7 | import { buttonVariants } from '.'
 8 |
 9 | interface Props extends PrimitiveProps {
10 |   variant?: ButtonVariants['variant']
11 |   size?: ButtonVariants['size']
12 |   class?: HTMLAttributes['class']
13 | }
14 |
15 | const props = withDefaults(defineProps<Props>(), {
16 |   as: 'button',
17 | })
18 | </script>
19 |
20 | <template>
21 |   <Primitive
22 |     :as="as"
23 |     :as-child="asChild"
24 |     :class="cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size }), props.class)"
25 |   >
26 |     <slot />
27 |   </Primitive>
28 | </template>
29 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/button/index.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { VariantProps } from 'class-variance-authority'
 2 | import { cva } from 'class-variance-authority'
 3 |
 4 | export { default as Button } from './Button.vue'
 5 |
 6 | // @unocss-include
 7 | export const buttonVariants = cva(
 8 |   'inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 [&_svg]:pointer-events-none [&_svg]:size-4 [&_svg]:shrink-0',
 9 |   {
10 |     variants: {
11 |       variant: {
12 |         default:
13 |           'bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow hover:bg-primary/90',
14 |         destructive:
15 |           'bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground shadow-sm hover:bg-destructive/90',
16 |         outline:
17 |           'border border-input bg-background shadow-sm hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground',
18 |         secondary:
19 |           'bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground shadow-sm hover:bg-secondary/80',
20 |         ghost: 'hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground',
21 |         link: 'text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline',
22 |       },
23 |       size: {
24 |         default: 'h-9 px-4 py-2',
25 |         xs: 'h-7 rounded px-2',
26 |         sm: 'h-8 rounded-md px-3 text-xs',
27 |         lg: 'h-10 rounded-md px-8',
28 |         icon: 'h-9 w-9',
29 |       },
30 |     },
31 |     defaultVariants: {
32 |       variant: 'default',
33 |       size: 'default',
34 |     },
35 |   },
36 | )
37 |
38 | export type ButtonVariants = VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants>
39 |

/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/checkbox/Checkbox.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import type { CheckboxRootEmits, CheckboxRootProps } from 'radix-vue'
 3 | import type { HTMLAttributes } from 'vue'
 4 | import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'
 5 | import { CheckIcon } from '@radix-icons/vue'
 6 | import {
 7 |   CheckboxIndicator,
 8 |   CheckboxRoot,
 9 |   useForwardPropsEmits,
10 | } from 'radix-vue'
11 | import { computed } from 'vue'
12 |
13 | const props = defineProps<
14 |   CheckboxRootProps & { class?: HTMLAttributes['class'] }
15 | >()
16 | const emits = defineEmits<CheckboxRootEmits>()
17 |
18 | const delegatedProps = computed(() => {
19 |   const { class: _, ...delegated } = props
20 |
21 |   return delegated
22 | })
23 |
24 | const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(delegatedProps, emits)
25 | </script>
26 |
27 | <template>
28 |   <CheckboxRoot
29 |     v-bind="forwarded"
30 |     :class="
31 |       cn(
32 |         'peer h-4 w-4 shrink-0 rounded-sm border border-primary shadow focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 data-[state=checked]:bg-primary data-[state=checked]:text-primary-foreground',
33 |         props.class,
34 |       )
35 |     "
36 |   >
37 |     <CheckboxIndicator
38 |       class="h-full w-full flex items-center justify-center text-current"
39 |     >
40 |       <slot>
41 |         <CheckIcon class="h-4 w-4" />
42 |       </slot>
43 |     </CheckboxIndicator>
44 |   </CheckboxRoot>
45 | </template>

10 | >()
11 |
12 | const delegatedProps = computed(() => {
13 |   const { class: _, ...delegated } = props
14 |
15 |   return delegated
16 | })
17 |
18 | const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(delegatedProps)
19 | </script>
20 |
21 | <template>
22 |   <DialogTitle
23 |     v-bind="forwardedProps"
24 |     :class="
25 |       cn('text-lg font-semibold leading-none tracking-tight', props.class)
26 |     "
27 |   >
28 |     <slot />
29 |   </DialogTitle>
30 | </template>
31 |

 7 |   shouldScaleBackground: true,

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/image/Images.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script lang="ts" setup>
 2 | import type { DefaultTheme } from 'vitepress/theme-without-fonts'
 3 |
 4 | import { computed } from 'vue'
 5 | import Image from './Image.vue'
 6 |
 7 | const { images } = defineProps<{
 8 |   images: DefaultTheme.ThemeableImage[]
 9 | }>()
10 |
11 | const gridClass = computed(() => {
12 |   switch (images.length) {
13 |     case 1:
14 |       return 'grid-cols-1'
15 |     case 2:
16 |       return 'grid-cols-2'
17 |     case 3:
18 |       return 'grid-cols-3 grid-rows-2'
19 |     case 4:
20 |       return 'grid-cols-2 grid-rows-2'
21 |     default:
22 |       return 'grid-cols-4'
23 |   }
24 | })
25 | </script>
26 |
27 | <template>
28 |   <div :class="`grid gap-1 max-h-250 ${gridClass}`">
29 |     <div
30 |       v-for="(image, index) in images"
31 |       :key="index"
32 |       class="relative w-full rounded-md rounded-sm"
33 |       :class="{
34 |         'row-span-2 flex flex-col': images.length === 3 && index === 0,
35 |         'col-span-2 row-span-2': images.length === 1,
36 |       }"
37 |     >
38 |       <Image
39 |         class="flex-1 object-cover"
40 |         :class="images.length === 3 && index === 0 ? 'flex-1' : ''"
41 |         :data-image-index="index"
42 |         :image="image"
43 |       />
44 |     </div>
45 |   </div>
46 | </template>
47 |

/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/input/Input.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import type { HTMLAttributes } from 'vue'
 3 | import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'
 4 | import { useVModel } from '@vueuse/core'
 5 |
 6 | const props = defineProps<{
 7 |   defaultValue?: string | number
 8 |   modelValue?: string | number
 9 |   class?: HTMLAttributes['class']
10 | }>()
11 |
12 | const emits
13 |   = defineEmits<(e: 'update:modelValue', payload: string | number) => void>()
14 |
15 | const modelValue = useVModel(props, 'modelValue', emits, {
16 |   passive: true,
17 |   defaultValue: props.defaultValue,
18 | })
19 | </script>
20 |
21 | <template>
22 |   <input
23 |     v-model="modelValue"
24 |     :class="
25 |       cn(
26 |         'flex h-9 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50',
27 |         props.class,
28 |       )
29 |     "
30 |   >
31 | </template>
32 |

12 |
13 |   return delegated
14 | })
15 | </script>

 2 | import type {
 3 |   NavigationMenuRootEmits,
 4 |   NavigationMenuRootProps,
 5 | } from 'radix-vue'
 6 | import type { HTMLAttributes } from 'vue'
 7 | import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'
 8 | import { NavigationMenuRoot, useForwardPropsEmits } from 'radix-vue'
 9 | import { computed } from 'vue'
10 |
11 | import NavigationMenuViewport from './NavigationMenuViewport.vue'
12 |
13 | const props = defineProps<
14 |   NavigationMenuRootProps & { class?: HTMLAttributes['class'] }
15 | >()
16 |
17 | const emits = defineEmits<NavigationMenuRootEmits>()
18 |
19 | const delegatedProps = computed(() => {
20 |   const { class: _, ...delegated } = props
21 |
22 |   return delegated
23 | })
24 |
25 | const forwarded = useForwardPropsEmits(delegatedProps, emits)
26 | </script>
27 |
28 | <template>
29 |   <NavigationMenuRoot
30 |     v-bind="forwarded"
31 |     :class="
32 |       cn(
33 |         'relative z-10 flex max-w-max flex-1 items-center justify-center',
34 |         props.class,
35 |       )
36 |     "
37 |   >
38 |     <slot />

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/photo-wall/UploadPhotoDragger.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script lang="ts" setup>
 2 | import { isArray } from 'lodash-es'
 3 | import { inject, ref } from 'vue'
 4 |
 5 | import { uploadContextKey } from './upload'
 6 |
 7 | const props = defineProps({
 8 |   disabled: {
 9 |     type: Boolean,
10 |     default: false,
11 |   },
12 | })
13 |
14 | const emit = defineEmits({
15 |   file: (file: File[]) => isArray(file),
16 | })
17 |
18 | const uploaderContext = inject(uploadContextKey)
19 |
20 | if (!uploaderContext) {
21 |   throw new Error('usage: <PhotoWall><PhototUploadDragger /></PhotoWall>')
22 | }
23 |
24 | const dragover = ref(false)
25 |
26 | function onDrop(e: DragEvent) {
27 |   if (props.disabled)
28 |     return
29 |   dragover.value = false
30 |
31 |   e.stopPropagation()
32 |
33 |   const files = Array.from(e.dataTransfer!.files)
34 |   emit('file', files)
35 | }
36 |
37 | function onDragover() {
38 |   if (!props.disabled)
39 |     dragover.value = true
40 | }
41 | </script>
42 |
43 | <template>
44 |   <div
45 |     @drop.prevent="onDrop"
46 |     @dragover.prevent="onDragover"
47 |     @dragleave.prevent="dragover = false"
48 |   >
49 |     <slot />
50 |   </div>
51 | </template>
52 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/photo-wall/index.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | export { default as PhotoWall } from './PhotoWall.vue'
2 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/photo-wall/uploadPhoto.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { ExtractPropTypes } from 'vue'
 2 | import type { UploadFile, UploadHooks, UploadRawFile } from './upload.ts'
 3 | import type UploadPhoto from './UploadPhoto.vue'
 4 | import { NOOP } from '@/components/type'
 5 | import { definePropType, uploadBaseProps } from './upload'
 6 |
 7 | export const uploadPhotoProps = {
 8 |   ...uploadBaseProps,
 9 |   onStart: {
10 |     type: definePropType<(rawFile: UploadRawFile) => void>(Function),
11 |     default: NOOP,
12 |   },
13 |   onRemove: {
14 |     type: definePropType<
15 |       (file: UploadFile | UploadRawFile, rawFile?: UploadRawFile) => void
16 |     >(Function),
17 |     default: NOOP,
18 |   },
19 |   onExceed: {
20 |     type: definePropType<UploadHooks['onExceed']>(Function),
21 |     default: NOOP,
22 |   },
23 | } as const
24 |
25 | export type UploadPhotoProps = ExtractPropTypes<typeof uploadPhotoProps>
26 |
27 | export type UploadPhotoInstance = InstanceType<typeof UploadPhoto>
28 |

 5 | import { PopoverContent, PopoverPortal, useForwardPropsEmits } from 'radix-vue'
 6 | import { computed } from 'vue'
 7 |
 8 | defineOptions({
 9 |   inheritAttrs: false,
10 | })
11 |
12 | const props = withDefaults(
13 |   defineProps<PopoverContentProps & { class?: HTMLAttributes['class'] }>(),
14 |   {
15 |     align: 'center',
16 |     sideOffset: 4,
17 |   },
18 | )
19 | const emits = defineEmits<PopoverContentEmits>()

22 |   const { class: _, ...delegated } = props

24 |   return delegated
25 | })
26 |

28 | </script>

33 |       v-bind="{ ...forwarded, ...$attrs }"

36 |           'z-50 w-72 rounded-md border bg-popover p-4 text-popover-foreground shadow-md outline-none data-[state=open]:animate-in data-[state=closed]:animate-out data-[state=closed]:fade-out-0 data-[state=open]:fade-in-0 data-[state=closed]:zoom-out-95 data-[state=open]:zoom-in-95 data-[side=bottom]:slide-in-from-top-2 data-[side=left]:slide-in-from-right-2 data-[side=right]:slide-in-from-left-2 data-[side=top]:slide-in-from-bottom-2',
37 |           props.class,
38 |         )
39 |       "

/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/select/SelectItem.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import type { SelectItemProps } from 'radix-vue'
 3 | import type { HTMLAttributes } from 'vue'
 4 | import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'
 5 | import { CheckIcon } from '@radix-icons/vue'
 6 | import {
 7 |   SelectItem,
 8 |   SelectItemIndicator,
 9 |   SelectItemText,
10 |   useForwardProps,
11 | } from 'radix-vue'
12 | import { computed } from 'vue'
13 |
14 | const props = defineProps<
15 |   SelectItemProps & { class?: HTMLAttributes['class'] }
16 | >()
17 |
18 | const delegatedProps = computed(() => {
19 |   const { class: _, ...delegated } = props
20 |
21 |   return delegated
22 | })
23 |
24 | const forwardedProps = useForwardProps(delegatedProps)
25 | </script>
26 |
27 | <template>
28 |   <SelectItem
29 |     v-bind="forwardedProps"
30 |     :class="
31 |       cn(
32 |         'relative flex w-full cursor-default select-none items-center rounded-sm py-1.5 pl-2 pr-8 text-sm outline-none focus:bg-accent focus:text-accent-foreground data-[disabled]:pointer-events-none data-[disabled]:opacity-50',
33 |         props.class,
34 |       )
35 |     "
36 |   >
37 |     <span class="absolute right-2 h-3.5 w-3.5 flex items-center justify-center">
38 |       <SelectItemIndicator>
39 |         <CheckIcon class="h-4 w-4" />
40 |       </SelectItemIndicator>
41 |     </span>
42 |
43 |     <SelectItemText>
44 |       <slot />
45 |     </SelectItemText>
46 |   </SelectItem>
47 | </template>
48 |

15 |   return delegated
16 | })
17 | </script>

27 |       )

29 |   >
30 |     <span
31 |       v-if="props.label"

33 |         cn(
34 |           'text-xs text-muted-foreground bg-background absolute top-1/2 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 flex justify-center items-center',
35 |           props.orientation === 'vertical'
36 |             ? 'w-[1px] px-1 py-2'
37 |             : 'h-[1px] py-1 px-2',
38 |         )
39 |       "
40 |     >{{ props.label }}</span>
41 |   </Separator>

 9 | </script>

/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/textarea/Textarea.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import type { HTMLAttributes } from 'vue'
 3 | import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'
 4 | import { useVModel } from '@vueuse/core'
 5 |
 6 | const props = defineProps<{
 7 |   class?: HTMLAttributes['class']
 8 |   defaultValue?: string | number
 9 |   modelValue?: string | number
10 | }>()
11 |
12 | const emits
13 |   = defineEmits<(e: 'update:modelValue', payload: string | number) => void>()
14 |
15 | const modelValue = useVModel(props, 'modelValue', emits, {
16 |   passive: true,
17 |   defaultValue: props.defaultValue,
18 | })
19 | </script>
20 |
21 | <template>
22 |   <textarea
23 |     v-model="modelValue"
24 |     :class="
25 |       cn(
26 |         'flex min-h-[60px] w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm shadow-sm placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50',
27 |         props.class,
28 |       )
29 |     "
30 |   />
31 | </template>
32 |
