--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | export { default as Textarea } from './Textarea.vue'
2 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/components/ui/types/notification.d.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | export interface NotificationAction {
 2 |   click?: (...args: any[]) => void
 3 |   label?: string
 4 | }
 5 |
 6 | export interface Notification {
 7 |   id: string
 8 |   title: string
 9 |   description?: string
10 |   icon?: string
11 |   closeButton?: boolean
12 |   timeout: number
13 |   actions?: NotificationAction[]
14 |   click?: (...args: unknown[]) => void
15 |   callback?: (...args: unknown[]) => void
16 |   color?: string
17 |   ui?: any
18 | }
19 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/composables/isFromExternalPage.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | export function isFromExternalPage() {
 2 |   if (import.meta.env.SSR)
 3 |     return false
 4 |
 5 |   const referrer = document.referrer
 6 |   const navigationEntry = performance.getEntriesByType(
 7 |     'navigation',
 8 |   )[0] as PerformanceNavigationTiming
 9 |
10 |   if (!navigationEntry)
11 |     return false // 获取不到数据，默认内部跳转
12 |
13 |   const isNewNavigation = navigationEntry.type === 'navigate'
14 |
15 |   if (!referrer)
16 |     return isNewNavigation
17 |
18 |   try {
19 |     const referrerUrl = new URL(referrer)
20 |     return referrerUrl.hostname !== window.location.hostname
21 |   }
22 |   catch {
23 |     return true
24 |   }
25 | }
26 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/composables/loadFonts.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { withBase } from 'vitepress'
 2 |
 3 | // const FONT_LOAD_STATE_STORE_KEY = 'FONTS_LOAD_STATE'
 4 | const FONT_LOAD_COMPLETE_CLASS = 'font-loaded'
 5 |
 6 | interface FontItem {
 7 |   fontName: string
 8 |   fontPath: string
 9 | }
10 |
11 | export function loadFonts(options: FontItem[]) {
12 |   if (import.meta.env.SSR)
13 |     return null
14 |   if (!('fonts' in document))
15 |     return null
16 |
17 |   // const fontsLoadState = useSessionStorage<string[]>(FONT_LOAD_STATE_STORE_KEY, [])
18 |
19 |   // const hasLoad = (family: string) => fontsLoadState.value.includes(family)
20 |
21 |   const loadFont = (fontName: string, fontPath: string): Promise<void> => {
22 |     // if (hasLoad(fontName)) return Promise.resolve()
23 |
24 |     const font = new FontFace(fontName, `url(${withBase(fontPath)})`, {
25 |       display: 'swap',
26 |     })
27 |
28 |     return font
29 |       .load()
30 |       .then(() => {
31 |         document.fonts.add(font)
32 |         // fontsLoadState.value = [...fontsLoadState.value, fontName]
33 |       })
34 |       .catch((error) => {
35 |         console.error(`Font load error (${fontName}):`, error)
36 |       })
37 |   }
38 |
39 |   Promise.all(options.map(font => loadFont(font.fontName, font.fontPath)))
40 |     .then(() => {
41 |       document.documentElement.classList.add(FONT_LOAD_COMPLETE_CLASS)
42 |     })
43 |     .catch((error) => {
44 |       console.error(`Font load error:`, error)
45 |     })
46 | }
47 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/composables/matchLanguages.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | export function matchLanguages(
 2 |   languages: string[],
 3 |   acceptLanguages: readonly string[],
 4 | ): string | null {
 5 |   {
 6 |     // const lang = acceptLanguages.map(userLang => languages.find(lang => lang.startsWith(userLang))).filter(v => !!v)[0]
 7 |     // TODO: Support es-419, remove this code if we include spanish country variants
 8 |     const lang = acceptLanguages
 9 |       .map(userLang =>
10 |         languages.find((currentLang) => {
11 |           if (currentLang === userLang)
12 |             return currentLang
13 |
14 |           // Edge browser: case for ca-valencia
15 |           if (currentLang === 'ca-valencia' && userLang === 'ca-Es-VALENCIA')
16 |             return currentLang
17 |
18 |           if (
19 |             userLang.startsWith('es-')
20 |             && userLang !== 'es-ES'
21 |             && currentLang === 'es-419'
22 |           ) {
23 |             return currentLang
24 |           }
25 |
26 |           return currentLang.startsWith(userLang) ? currentLang : undefined
27 |         }),
28 |       )
29 |       .filter(v => !!v)?.[0]
30 |     if (lang)
31 |       return lang
32 |   }
33 |
34 |   const lang = acceptLanguages
35 |     .map((userLang) => {
36 |       userLang = userLang.split('-')[0]!
37 |       return languages.find(lang => lang.startsWith(userLang))
38 |     })
39 |     .filter(v => !!v)[0]
40 |   if (lang)
41 |     return lang
42 |
43 |   return null
44 | }
45 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/composables/replaceTitle.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | export function replaceTitle(title: string) {
 2 |   if (import.meta.env.SSR)
 3 |     return
 4 |
 5 |   const oldTitle = document.title
 6 |
 7 |   if (oldTitle.includes('|')) {
 8 |     document.title = oldTitle.replace(/[^|]+/, ` ${title.trim()}`)
 9 |   }
10 |   else {
11 |     document.title = title
12 |   }
13 | }
14 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/composables/useLanguage.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { equalLangCode, getLangPath } from '@/utils'
 2 | import { useData } from 'vitepress'
 3 | import { computed } from 'vue'
 4 | import { matchLanguages } from './matchLanguages'
 5 |
 6 | const DEFAULT_LANG = 'zh'
 7 |
 8 | export function useLanguage(supportedLanguages: string[] = ['zh', 'en', 'ja'], defaultLang = DEFAULT_LANG) {
 9 |   const { localeIndex } = useData()
10 |
11 |   const currentPageLang = computed(() => getLangPath(localeIndex.value).replace('/', DEFAULT_LANG))
12 |   const matchedLang = matchLanguages(supportedLanguages, import.meta.env.SSR ? [defaultLang] : navigator?.languages) || defaultLang
13 |   const noTranslationRequirement = computed(() => equalLangCode(matchedLang, currentPageLang.value))
14 |
15 |   return {
16 |     currentPageLang,
17 |     noTranslationRequirement,
18 |     matchedLang,
19 |   }
20 | }
21 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/hooks/useOptimistic.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { ComputedRef, Ref } from 'vue'
 2 | import { computed, shallowRef, watch } from 'vue'
 3 |
 4 | export function useOptimistic<TState, TOptimisticValue>(
 5 |   state: Ref<TState>,
 6 |   updateFn: (current: TState, value: TOptimisticValue) => TState,
 7 | ): [
 8 |   optimisticState: ComputedRef<TState>,
 9 |   addOptimistic: (value: TOptimisticValue) => { rollback: () => void },
10 |   ] {
11 |   const pendingQueue = shallowRef<
12 |     Array<{
13 |       value: TOptimisticValue
14 |       version: number
15 |     }>
16 |   >([])
17 |
18 |   let stateVersion = 0
19 |
20 |   watch(state, () => {
21 |     stateVersion++
22 |     pendingQueue.value = []
23 |   })
24 |
25 |   const optimisticState = computed(() => {
26 |     return pendingQueue.value.reduce(
27 |       (acc, { value }) => updateFn(acc, value),
28 |       state.value,
29 |     )
30 |   })
31 |
32 |   const addOptimistic = (value: TOptimisticValue) => {
33 |     const currentVersion = stateVersion
34 |     const newEntry = { value, version: currentVersion }
35 |
36 |     pendingQueue.value = [...pendingQueue.value, newEntry]
37 |
38 |     return {
39 |       rollback: () => {
40 |         if (currentVersion === stateVersion) {
41 |           pendingQueue.value = pendingQueue.value.filter(
42 |             entry => entry !== newEntry,
43 |           )
44 |         }
45 |       },
46 |     }
47 |   }
48 |
49 |   return [optimisticState, addOptimistic]
50 | }
51 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/hooks/useTimer.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { UseTimestampOptions } from '@vueuse/core'
 2 | import { useTimestamp } from '@vueuse/core'
 3 | import { computed, ref } from 'vue'
 4 |
 5 | export function useTimer(
 6 |   cb: (...args: unknown[]) => void,
 7 |   interval: number,
 8 |   options?: UseTimestampOptions<true>,
 9 | ) {
10 |   let timer: number | null = null
11 |   const {
12 |     pause: tPause,
13 |     resume: tResume,
14 |     timestamp,
15 |   } = useTimestamp({ ...(options || {}), controls: true })
16 |   const startTime = ref<number | null>(null)
17 |
18 |   const remaining = computed(() => {
19 |     if (!startTime.value) {
20 |       return 0
21 |     }
22 |     return interval - (timestamp.value - startTime.value)
23 |   })
24 |
25 |   function set(...args: unknown[]) {
26 |     timer = setTimeout(() => {
27 |       timer = null
28 |       startTime.value = null
29 |       cb(...args)
30 |     }, remaining.value) as unknown as number
31 |   }
32 |
33 |   function clear() {
34 |     if (timer) {
35 |       clearTimeout(timer)
36 |       timer = null
37 |     }
38 |   }
39 |
40 |   function start() {
41 |     startTime.value = Date.now()
42 |
43 |     set()
44 |   }
45 |
46 |   function stop() {
47 |     clear()
48 |     tPause()
49 |   }
50 |
51 |   function pause() {
52 |     clear()
53 |     tPause()
54 |   }
55 |
56 |   function resume() {
57 |     set()
58 |     tResume()
59 |     startTime.value = (startTime.value || 0) + (Date.now() - timestamp.value)
60 |   }
61 |
62 |   start()
63 |
64 |   return {
65 |     start,
66 |     stop,
67 |     pause,
68 |     resume,
69 |     remaining,
70 |   }
71 | }
72 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/index.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { Theme } from 'vitepress'
 2 | import Card from '@/components/Card.vue'
 3 | import Coins from '@/components/Coins.vue'
 4 | import * as components from '@/components/ui/'
 5 | import Layout from '@/layouts/Layout.vue'
 6 | import { createHead } from '@unhead/vue'
 7 | import { MotionPlugin } from '@vueuse/motion'
 8 | import { createPinia } from 'pinia'
 9 | import DefaultTheme, {
10 |   VPBadge,
11 |   VPImage,
12 |   VPLink,
13 | } from 'vitepress/theme-without-fonts'
14 | import googleAnalytics from '../plugins/google-analytics'
15 | import Headline from './layouts/Headline.vue'
16 | import Post from './layouts/Post.vue'
17 |
18 | import 'uno.css'
19 |
20 | const pinia = createPinia()
21 |
22 | export default {
23 |   ...DefaultTheme,
24 |   Layout,
25 |
26 |   enhanceApp({ app }) {
27 |     googleAnalytics({
28 |       id: 'G-Q2K9DXZCEY',
29 |       debug: false,
30 |     })
31 |
32 |     app.use(pinia)
33 |     app.use(MotionPlugin)
34 |     app.use(createHead())
35 |
36 |     app.component('Coins', Coins)
37 |     app.component('Card', Card)
38 |     app.component('VPBadge', VPBadge)
39 |     app.component('VPImage', VPImage)
40 |     app.component('VPLink', VPLink)
41 |     app.component('Headline', Headline)
42 |     app.component('Post', Post)
43 |
44 |     for (const component of Object.keys(
45 |       components,
46 |     ) as (keyof typeof components)[])
47 |       app.component(component, components[component])
48 |   },
49 | } satisfies Theme
50 |

3 | import { twMerge } from 'tailwind-merge'
4 |
5 | export function cn(...inputs: ClassValue[]) {
6 |   return twMerge(clsx(inputs))
7 | }

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/markdown/colorPreview.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type MarkdownIt from 'markdown-it'
 2 |
 3 | const COLOR_REGEX
 4 |   = /(?:\s|^)(#(?:[a-fA-F0-9]{3}){1,2}|(?:#(?:[a-fA-F0-9]{4}){1,2})?\b|rgba?\(\d+,\s*\d+,\s*\d+(?:,\s*\d+(?:\.\d+)?)?\)|hsla?\(\d+,\s*\d+%?,\s*\d+%?,?\s*(?:,\s*\d+(?:\.\d+)?)?\))(?:[^#a-zA-Z0-9]|$)/g
 5 |
 6 | export function colorPreviewPlugin(md: MarkdownIt) {
 7 |   const replaceColor = (colorStr: string) => {
 8 |     colorStr = colorStr.trim()
 9 |     let color = colorStr.replace(/\P{ASCII}\p{Nd}/gu, '')
10 |
11 |     if (color.startsWith('#')) {
12 |       color = color.replace(/[^#0-9a-f]/gi, '')
13 |     }
14 |     else {
15 |       const index = color.lastIndexOf(')')
16 |       if (index !== -1) {
17 |         color = color.slice(0, index + 1)
18 |       }
19 |     }
20 |
21 |     return `<span class='color-swatch' style='background-color: ${color}'></span>${colorStr} `
22 |   }
23 |
24 |   md.renderer.rules.text = (tokens, idx) => {
25 |     let text = tokens[idx].content
26 |     text = md.utils.escapeHtml(text)
27 |     return text.replace(COLOR_REGEX, replaceColor)
28 |   }
29 | }
30 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/markdown/customColor.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type MarkdownIt from 'markdown-it'
 2 | import type StateInline from 'markdown-it/lib/rules_inline/state_inline.mjs'
 3 |
 4 | function customColor(md: MarkdownIt): void {
 5 |   md.inline.ruler.before(
 6 |     'emphasis',
 7 |     'custom_color',
 8 |     (state: StateInline, silent: boolean): boolean => {
 9 |       const start = state.pos
10 |       const src = state.src.slice(start)
11 |
12 |       const match = src.match(/^\{color:([^}]+)\}(.*?)\{\/color\}/)
13 |
14 |       if (!match)
15 |         return false
16 |       if (silent)
17 |         return true
18 |
19 |       // Extract color and content
20 |       const color = match[1]
21 |       const content = match[2]
22 |
23 |       // Create opening tag token
24 |       const tokenOpen = state.push('html_inline', '', 0)
25 |       tokenOpen.content = `<span style="color:${color}">`
26 |
27 |       // Create content token
28 |       const tokenContent = state.push('html_inline', '', 0)
29 |       tokenContent.content = md.renderInline(content)
30 |
31 |       // Create closing tag token
32 |       const tokenClose = state.push('html_inline', '', 0)
33 |       tokenClose.content = `</span>`
34 |
35 |       // Move the parser position forward
36 |       state.pos += match[0].length
37 |
38 |       return true
39 |     },
40 |   )
41 | }
42 |
43 | export default customColor
44 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/markdown/lightbox.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | /**
 2 |  * VitePress plugin to add `medium-zoom` lightbox to images.
 3 |  * @param {any} md - Markdown.
 4 |  */
 5 | export default function lightbox(md: any) {
 6 |   // Store the original image renderer
 7 |   const defaultImageRenderer = md.renderer.rules.image
 8 |
 9 |   // Customize the image renderer.
10 |   md.renderer.rules.image = (
11 |     tokens: any,
12 |     idx: any,
13 |     options: any,
14 |     env: any,
15 |     self: any,
16 |   ) => {
17 |     // Add data-zoomable attribute to the images
18 |     tokens[idx].attrSet('data-zoomable', true)
19 |
20 |     return defaultImageRenderer(tokens, idx, options, env, self)
21 |   }
22 | }
23 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/markdown/timeline.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type MarkdownIt from 'markdown-it'
 2 | import type { RenderRule } from 'markdown-it/lib/renderer.mjs'
 3 | import type Token from 'markdown-it/lib/token.mjs'
 4 | import dayjs from 'dayjs'
 5 |
 6 | import container from 'markdown-it-container'
 7 |
 8 | export function getdefaultTime() {
 9 |   return dayjs().format('YYYY-MM-DD')
10 | }
11 |
12 | export function timeline(md: MarkdownIt) {
13 |   md.use(...createContainer('timeline', getdefaultTime(), md))
14 | }
15 |
16 | type ContainerArgs = [typeof container, string, { render: RenderRule }]
17 | function createContainer(
18 |   klass: string,
19 |   defaultTime: string,
20 |   md: MarkdownIt,
21 | ): ContainerArgs {
22 |   return [
23 |     container,
24 |     klass,
25 |     {
26 |       render(tokens: Token[], idx: number) {
27 |         const token = tokens[idx]
28 |         const info = token.info.trim().slice(klass.length).trim()
29 |         if (token.nesting === 1) {
30 |           // opening tag
31 |           const title = md.renderInline(info)
32 |           return `<div class='timeline-dot'><span class='timeline-dot-title'>${
33 |             title
34 |           }</span>\n`
35 |         }
36 |         // closing tag
37 |         return '</div>\n'
38 |       },
39 |     },
40 |   ]
41 | }
42 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/stores/useNotification.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { Notification } from '../components/ui/types/notification'
 2 | import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
 3 |
 4 | import { ref } from 'vue'
 5 |
 6 | export const useNotificationStore = defineStore('notifications', () => {
 7 |   const notifications = ref<Notification[]>([])
 8 |
 9 |   function add(notification: Partial<Notification>) {
10 |     const body = {
11 |       id: new Date().getTime().toString(),
12 |       ...notification,
13 |     }
14 |
15 |     const index = notifications.value.findIndex(
16 |       (n: Notification) => n.id === body.id,
17 |     )
18 |     if (index === -1) {
19 |       notifications.value.push(body as Notification)
20 |     }
21 |
22 |     return body
23 |   }
24 |
25 |   function remove(id: string) {
26 |     notifications.value = notifications.value.filter(
27 |       (n: Notification) => n.id !== id,
28 |     )
29 |   }
30 |
31 |   function update(id: string, notification: Partial<Notification>) {
32 |     const index = notifications.value.findIndex(
33 |       (n: Notification) => n.id === id,
34 |     )
35 |     if (index !== -1) {
36 |       const previous = notifications.value[index]
37 |       notifications.value.splice(index, 1, { ...previous, ...notification })
38 |     }
39 |   }
40 |
41 |   function clear() {
42 |     notifications.value = []
43 |   }
44 |
45 |   return {
46 |     add,
47 |     remove,
48 |     update,
49 |     clear,
50 |     notifications,
51 |   }
52 | })
53 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/.vitepress/theme/stores/useUserInfo.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type ForumAPI from '@/apis/forum/api'
 2 | import FingerprintJS from '@fingerprintjs/fingerprintjs'
 3 | import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
 4 | import { ref } from 'vue'
 5 |
 6 | import { getUser } from '../apis/forum/gitee/user'
 7 | import { useUserAuthStore } from './useUserAuth'
 8 |
 9 | interface FingerprintAgain {
10 |   visitorId: string
11 |   confidence: {
12 |     score: number
13 |     comment?: string
14 |   }
15 |   components: {
16 |     [key: string]:
17 |       { value: unknown, duration: number } |
18 |       { error: object, duration: number }
19 |   }
20 |   version: string
21 | }
22 |
23 | export const useUserInfoStore = defineStore('user-info', () => {
24 |   const userAuthStore = useUserAuthStore()
25 |
26 |   const info = ref<ForumAPI.User>()
27 |
28 |   const fingerprint = ref<FingerprintAgain>()
29 |
30 |   const refreshFingerprint = async () => {
31 |     if (import.meta.env.SSR)
32 |       return
33 |     const fp = await FingerprintJS.load()
34 |     fingerprint.value = await fp.get()
35 |   }
36 |
37 |   const refreshUserInfo = async () => {
38 |     if (userAuthStore.isTokenValid && userAuthStore.auth.accessToken) {
39 |       info.value = await getUser(userAuthStore.auth.accessToken)
40 |     }
41 |   }
42 |
43 |   const clearUserInfo = () => (info.value = undefined)
44 |
45 |   refreshUserInfo()
46 |
47 |   return {
48 |     // states
49 |     info,
50 |     fingerprint,
51 |
52 |     // actions
53 |     refreshUserInfo,
54 |     refreshFingerprint,
55 |     clearUserInfo,
56 |   }
57 | })
58 |

 2 | $pc: 1440px !default;
 3 |
 4 | // desktop
 5 | $laptop: 1280px !default;

 7 | // narrow desktop / iPad
 8 | $pad: 959px !default;
 9 |
10 | // wide mobile
11 | $tablet: 719px !default;
12 |
13 | // narrow mobile

15 |
16 | /* rtl */
17 | $rtl-selector: 'html[dir="rtl"]' !default;
18 |
19 | /* Content Class */
20 | $content-class: '.theme-default-content' !default;
21 |
22 | /** dark mode selectors */
23 | $dark-selector: 'html.dark' !default;
24 | $light-selector: 'html:not(.dark)' !default;

 2 |   font-family: 'HYWenHei-85W-min';

 9 |     url('/fonts/HYWenHei-85W-zh-min.ttf') format('ttf');

16 |   src:
17 |     local('☺'),
18 |     url('/fonts/HYWenHei-45W-min.woff2') format('woff2'),

/.vitepress/theme/styles/kbd.css:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | kbd {
 2 |   display: inline-flex;
 3 |   justify-content: center;
 4 |   align-items: center;
 5 |   font-size: 14px;
 6 |   min-width: 20px;
 7 |   height: 1.25rem;
 8 |   vertical-align: text-top;
 9 |   padding-left: 0.25rem;
10 |   padding-right: 0.25rem;
11 |   border-radius: 0.25rem;
12 |   margin: 0 0.25rem;
13 |   margin-bottom: 0 !important;
14 |   margin-top: 0 !important;
15 |   border-color: var(--vp-badge-info-border);
16 |   color: var(--vp-c-text-1);
17 |   box-shadow: var(--vp-shadow-1);
18 |   background-color: var(--vp-badge-info-bg);
19 | }
20 |

 3 |   width: 25px;
 4 |   aspect-ratio: 1;
 5 |   border-radius: 50%;
 6 |   background:
 7 |     radial-gradient(farthest-side, var(--vp-c-brand-1) 94%, #0000) top / 8px 8px
 8 |       no-repeat,
 9 |     conic-gradient(#0000 30%, var(--vp-c-brand-1));
10 |   -webkit-mask: radial-gradient(farthest-side, #0000 calc(100% - 8px), #000 0);
11 |   animation: l13 1s infinite linear;
12 | }

14 | @keyframes l13 {
15 |   100% {
16 |     transform: rotate(1turn);
17 |   }
18 | }

23 |   position: relative;

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/README.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | # 空荧地图文档
 2 |
 3 | [![Check](https://github.com/kongying-tavern/docs/actions/workflows/check.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/kongying-tavern/docs/actions/workflows/check.yml)
 4 | [![Links](https://github.com/kongying-tavern/docs/actions/workflows/links.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/kongying-tavern/docs/actions/workflows/links.yml)
 5 | [![Deployment](https://github.com/kongying-tavern/docs/actions/workflows/deployment.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/kongying-tavern/docs/actions/workflows/deployment.yml)
 6 | [![license](https://badgen.net/github/license/kongying-tavern/docs)](https://github.com/kongying-tavern/docs/blob/next/LICENSE)
 7 | [![discord](https://badgen.net/discord/online-members/aFe57AKZUF?icon=discord&label=discord)](https://discord.gg/aFe57AKZUF)
 8 |
 9 | ## Status: W.I.P.
10 |
11 | ## Contributing
12 |
13 | This site is built with [VitePress](https://github.com/vuejs/vitepress). Site content is written in Markdown format located in `src`. For simple edits, you can directly edit the file on GitHub and generate a Pull Request.
14 |
15 | For local development, [pnpm](https://pnpm.io/) is preferred as package manager:
16 |
17 | ```bash
18 | corepack enable
19 | pnpm i
20 | pnpm run dev
21 | ```
22 |
23 | This project requires Node.js to be `v18.0.0` or higher, because we use new JavaScript features in our code, such as optional chaining.
24 |
25 | ## Working on the content
26 |
27 | - See VitePress docs on supported [Markdown Extensions](https://vitepress.vuejs.org/guide/markdown) and the ability to [use Vue syntax inside markdown](https://vitepress.vuejs.org/guide/using-vue).
28 |
29 | ## License
30 |
31 | [MIT](https://github.com/kongying-tavern/docs/blob/next/LICENSE)
32 |

 3 | pull_request_labels:
 4 |   - i18n
 5 | files:
 6 |   - source: /src/**/*.md
 7 |     translation: /src/%locale%/**/%file_name%.md
 8 |     ignore:
 9 |       - /src/en/
10 |       - /src/ja/
11 |       - /src/ko/
12 |       - /src/fr/

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/scripts/resolveCustomIcons.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import fs from 'node:fs'
 2 | import path from 'node:path'
 3 | import { fileURLToPath, URL } from 'node:url'
 4 |
 5 | interface IconData {
 6 |   [key: string]: string
 7 | }
 8 |
 9 | export function resolveCustomIcons(): IconData {
10 |   const svgDir = path.resolve(
11 |     fileURLToPath(new URL('../src/public/imgs/common/svg', import.meta.url)),
12 |   )
13 |   const data: IconData = {}
14 |
15 |   // Ensure the directory exists before reading
16 |   if (!fs.existsSync(svgDir)) {
17 |     throw new Error(`Directory not found: ${svgDir}`)
18 |   }
19 |
20 |   const svgFiles = fs
21 |     .readdirSync(svgDir)
22 |     .filter(file => file.endsWith('.svg'))
23 |
24 |   svgFiles.forEach((file) => {
25 |     const fileNameWithoutExt = path.basename(file, '.svg')
26 |     const filePath = path.join(svgDir, file)
27 |
28 |     data[fileNameWithoutExt] = fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf8')
29 |   })
30 |
31 |   return data
32 | }
33 |

/src/components/forum/Forum.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import { useInfiniteScroll } from '@vueuse/core'
 3 | import { onMounted } from 'vue'
 4 |
 5 | import { useForumData } from '~/stores/useForumData'
 6 | import ForumAside from './ForumAside.vue'
 7 | import ForumHeader from './ForumHeader.vue'
 8 | import ForumLayout from './ForumLayout.vue'
 9 | import ForumLoadState from './ForumLoadState.vue'
10 | import ForumTopicsList from './ForumTopicsList.vue'
11 | import ForumPublishTopicForm from './publish-topic-form/ForumPublishTopicForm.vue'
12 |
13 | const forumData = useForumData()
14 |
15 | const { loadMore } = forumData
16 |
17 | function init() {
18 |   if (import.meta.env.SSR)
19 |     return null
20 |
21 |   useInfiniteScroll(
22 |     window,
23 |     () => {
24 |       loadMore()
25 |     },
26 |     {
27 |       distance: 10,
28 |       interval: 1500,
29 |       canLoadMore: () => forumData.canLoadMore,
30 |     },
31 |   )
32 | }
33 |
34 | onMounted(() => {
35 |   init()
36 | })
37 | </script>
38 |
39 | <template>
40 |   <ClientOnly>
41 |     <ForumLayout>
42 |       <template #header>
43 |         <ForumHeader class="forum-header" />
44 |       </template>
45 |
46 |       <template #content>
47 |         <Suspense>
48 |           <ForumTopicsList />
49 |         </Suspense>
50 |
51 |         <ForumLoadState
52 |           :loading="forumData.loading"
53 |           :text="forumData.loadStateMessage"
54 |         />
55 |       </template>
56 |
57 |       <template #aside>
58 |         <ForumAside />
59 |       </template>
60 |     </ForumLayout>
61 |     <Teleport to="body">
62 |       <ForumPublishTopicForm />
63 |     </Teleport>
64 |   </ClientOnly>
65 | </template>
66 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/components/forum/ForumDate.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import { useLocalized } from '@/hooks/useLocalized'
 3 |
 4 | const { date = new Date(), format = undefined } = defineProps<{
 5 |   date?: string | number
 6 |   format?: string
 7 | }>()
 8 | const { formatDate } = useLocalized()
 9 |
10 | const dateStr = formatDate(date, format)
11 | </script>
12 |
13 | <template>
14 |   <time :datetime="dateStr">
15 |     {{ dateStr }}
16 |   </time>
17 | </template>
18 |

/src/components/forum/ForumLoadState.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script lang="ts" setup>
 2 | import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'
 3 | import { ReloadIcon } from '@radix-icons/vue'
 4 |
 5 | defineProps({
 6 |   loading: {
 7 |     type: Boolean,
 8 |     default: false,
 9 |   },
10 |   text: {
11 |     type: String,
12 |     default: 'Loading...',
13 |   },
14 | })
15 | </script>
16 |
17 | <template>
18 |   <div class="my-8 w-full flex justify-center">
19 |     <Button v-if="loading" class="vp-link" variant="link">
20 |       <ReloadIcon class="mr-2 h-4 w-4" :class="loading ? 'animate-spin' : ''" />
21 |       {{ text }}
22 |     </Button>
23 |     <p v-else class="font-size-3 c-[var(--vp-c-text-3)]" variant="link">
24 |       {{ text }}
25 |     </p>
26 |   </div>
27 | </template>
28 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/components/forum/ForumRoleBadge.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import { useLocalized } from '@/hooks/useLocalized'
 3 | import { computed } from 'vue'
 4 | import { isAuthor } from '~/composables/isAuthor'
 5 | import { useRuleChecks } from '~/composables/useRuleChecks'
 6 |
 7 | const { authorId = null, type = null } = defineProps<{
 8 |   type?: 'official' | 'author' | null
 9 |   authorId?: string | number | null
10 | }>()
11 | const { message } = useLocalized()
12 | const { isOfficial } = useRuleChecks()
13 |
14 | const userRole = computed(() => {
15 |   if (!authorId)
16 |     return null
17 |   if (isAuthor(authorId).value)
18 |     return 'author'
19 |   if (isOfficial(authorId).value)
20 |     return 'official'
21 |   return null
22 | })
23 |
24 | const role = computed(() => type || userRole.value)
25 | </script>
26 |
27 | <template>
28 |   <div v-if="role" class="mb-1 inline-block align-middle">
29 |     <span
30 |       v-if="role === 'official'"
31 |       class="ml-0.5 inline-flex scale-80 items-center rounded-md bg-[#c9353f1a] px-1.5 pb-0.5 pt-0.75 align-middle text-xs c-[#d8111b] font-semibold transition-colors"
32 |     >
33 |       {{ message.forum.topic.official }}
34 |     </span>
35 |     <span
36 |       v-if="role === 'author'"
37 |       class="ml-0.5 inline-flex scale-80 items-center rounded-md bg-[#2c71ff1a] px-1.5 pb-0.5 pt-0.75 align-middle text-xs c-[#0056e3] font-semibold transition-colors"
38 |     >
39 |       {{ message.forum.topic.author }}
40 |     </span>
41 |   </div>
42 | </template>
43 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/components/forum/ForumTagList.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import { computed } from 'vue'
 3 |
 4 | import { getTopicTagLabelGetter } from '~/composables/getTopicTagLabelGetter'
 5 | import { getTopicTagMap } from '~/composables/getTopicTagMap'
 6 |
 7 | const props = defineProps<{
 8 |   data: string[]
 9 | }>()
10 |
11 | const topicTagMap = getTopicTagMap()
12 | const topicLabelGetter = getTopicTagLabelGetter()
13 |
14 | const tags = computed(() =>
15 |   props.data.filter(label => topicLabelGetter.isLabel(label)),
16 | )
17 | </script>
18 |
19 | <template>
20 |   <div v-if="tags.length > 0">
21 |     <span
22 |       v-for="label in tags"
23 |       :key="label"
24 |       class="pointer-events-auto mr-2 mt-2 inline-flex rounded-full bg-[--vp-c-bg-soft] px-2.5 font-size-3 color-[--vp-c-text-2] font-[var(--vp-font-family-subtitle)]"
25 |     >
26 |       #{{ topicTagMap.get(topicLabelGetter.getTag(label) ?? '') }}
27 |     </span>
28 |   </div>
29 | </template>
30 |

24 |         <span class="i-custom-ellipsis-vertical icon-btn" />

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/components/forum/ForumTopicDropdownMenu.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import type ForumAPI from '@/apis/forum/api'
 3 | import type { DropdownMenuContentProps } from 'radix-vue'
 4 | import type { HTMLAttributes } from 'vue'
 5 | import type { FORUM } from './types'
 6 | import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'
 7 | import {
 8 |   DropdownMenu,
 9 |   DropdownMenuContent,
10 |   DropdownMenuTrigger,
11 | } from '@/components/ui/dropdown-menu'
12 | import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'
13 | import ForumDropdownMenu from './ForumDropdownMenu.vue'
14 |
15 | defineOptions({
16 |   inheritAttrs: false,
17 | })
18 |
19 | const { side = 'top' } = defineProps<
20 |   {
21 |     topicData: ForumAPI.Topic
22 |     class?: HTMLAttributes['class']
23 |     menu: FORUM.TopicDropdownMenu[]
24 |   } & DropdownMenuContentProps
25 | >()
26 | </script>
27 |
28 | <template>
29 |   <DropdownMenu>
30 |     <DropdownMenuTrigger as-child>
31 |       <Button
32 |         variant="ghost"
33 |         size="icon"
34 |         :class="cn('topic-btn-more align-mid h-auto', $props.class)"
35 |       >
36 |         <slot name="trigger">
37 |           <span class="i-custom-ellipsis-vertical icon-btn" />
38 |         </slot>
39 |       </Button>
40 |     </DropdownMenuTrigger>
41 |     <DropdownMenuContent :side="side" class="w-max text-nowrap">
42 |       <slot name="menu" />
43 |       <ForumDropdownMenu :items="menu" />
44 |     </DropdownMenuContent>
45 |   </DropdownMenu>
46 | </template>
47 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/components/forum/ForumUser.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import type ForumAPI from '@/apis/forum/api'
 3 |
 4 | import Avatar from '@/components/ui/Avatar.vue'
 5 | import Button from '@/components/ui/button/Button.vue'
 6 |
 7 | const { user } = defineProps<{
 8 |   user: ForumAPI.User
 9 | }>()
10 |
11 | function handleClick() {
12 |   window.open(`https://gitee.com/${user.login}`)
13 | }
14 | </script>
15 |
16 | <template>
17 |   <Button variant="ghost" @click="handleClick">
18 |     <Avatar size="sm" :src="user.avatar" />
19 |     <div class="w-fit text-left">
20 |       <span
21 |         class="block c-[var(--vp-c-text-1)] font-medium lh-4 font-[var(--vp-font-family-subtitle)]"
22 |       >
23 |         {{ user.username }}
24 |       </span>
25 |       <span class="c-[var(--vp-c-text-3)] font-[var(--vp-font-family-content)]">
26 |         @{{ user.login }}
27 |       </span>
28 |     </div>
29 |   </Button>
30 | </template>
31 |

 9 |   description?: string

20 |         format="LL"

 2 | import type { ComputedRef } from 'vue'
 3 |
 4 | export interface FieldConfig {
 5 |   label: string
 6 |   placeholder: string
 7 |   maxLength: number
 8 | }
 9 |
10 | export type TabsConfig = {
11 |   value: Exclude<ForumAPI.TopicType, null>
12 |   label: string
13 |   condition: boolean | ComputedRef<boolean>
14 |   fields: {
15 |     upload: FieldConfig
16 |     content: FieldConfig
17 |     title?: FieldConfig
18 |     tags?: FieldConfig
19 |     permissions?: FieldConfig
20 |   }
21 | }[]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/components/forum/types.d.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { HTMLAttributes } from 'vue'
 2 |
 3 | export namespace FORUM {
 4 |   type MenuOrder = number | 'last'
 5 |
 6 |   interface MenuItemBase {
 7 |     type: 'item'
 8 |     label: string
 9 |     icon?: string
10 |     shortcut?: string
11 |     disabled?: boolean
12 |     class?: HTMLAttributes['class']
13 |     action?: () => void
14 |     id?: string
15 |     order?: MenuOrder
16 |   }
17 |
18 |   interface MenuLabel {
19 |     type: 'label'
20 |     icon?: string
21 |     label: string
22 |     class?: HTMLAttributes['class']
23 |     id?: string
24 |     order?: MenuOrder
25 |   }
26 |
27 |   interface MenuSeparator {
28 |     type: 'separator'
29 |     order?: MenuOrder
30 |   }
31 |
32 |   interface MenuGroup {
33 |     type: 'group'
34 |     items: MenuElement[]
35 |     order?: MenuOrder
36 |   }
37 |
38 |   interface MenuSubmenu extends Omit<MenuItemBase, 'type' | 'action' | 'shortcut'> {
39 |     type: 'submenu'
40 |     items: MenuElement[]
41 |     order?: MenuOrder
42 |   }
43 |
44 |   type MenuElement = MenuItemBase | MenuLabel | MenuSeparator | MenuGroup | MenuSubmenu
45 |
46 |   export type TopicDropdownMenu = MenuElement
47 | }
48 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/components/links/Community.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | const serverMap: Record<string, Record<string, unknown>> = {
 2 |   discord: {
 3 |     id: 'discord',
 4 |     name: '',
 5 |     target: '_blank',
 6 |     link: 'https://discord.com/invite/aFe57AKZUF',
 7 |     secondary: 'aFe57AKZUF',
 8 |     icon: 'i-logos-discord-icon',
 9 |   },
10 |   qq: {
11 |     id: 'qq',
12 |     name: '',
13 |     target: '_blank',
14 |     secondary: 'f006fek0f',
15 |     link: 'https://pd.qq.com/s/f006fek0f',
16 |     icon: '/imgs/common/svg/qq-channel.svg',
17 |   },
18 | }
19 |
20 | export function serverLink(key: string, text: string): Record<string, unknown> {
21 |   const link = serverMap[key]
22 |
23 |   link.name = text
24 |
25 |   return link
26 | }
27 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/components/links/Join.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { UrlParams } from '@vueuse/core'
 2 |
 3 | export const linkMap: Record<string, unknown> = {
 4 |   dd: {
 5 |     id: 'dd',
 6 |     link: 'http://qm.qq.com/cgi-bin/qm/qr?_wv=1027&k=-HGS3II1no-AEcWHYdrhsJCN2IfKQeji&authKey=qbjuuv5VygEdFUAZSCCr2kim3V0lYvLvRjJwM7nv8KplMKjVAO4m2FuDovmcx%2FJP&noverify=0&group_code=522563995 ',
 7 |   },
 8 |   kf: {
 9 |     id: 'kf',
10 |     link: 'https://qm.qq.com/cgi-bin/qm/qr?k=wXbtoDmXCjlR8iJ-3lRwdNIOWio3quit&jump_from=webapi&authKey=aS/Be7vKSbcu/6zrmYVlpF6DsSnkHVMGT6Arn+RU+IiJf8ItKIFEXnVvfFmOL9We',
11 |   },
12 | }
13 |
14 | export function linkJump(
15 |   params: UrlParams,
16 |   links: Record<string, unknown>[],
17 | ): void {
18 |   const target = String(params.q).toLocaleLowerCase()
19 |
20 |   links.forEach((val) => {
21 |     if (val.id === target) {
22 |       location.href = val.link as string
23 |     }
24 |   })
25 | }
26 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/components/release/Release.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | export type VersionType =
 2 |   | 'Beta'
 3 |   | 'Alpha'
 4 |   | 'RC'
 5 |   | 'Stable'
 6 |   | 'Test'
 7 |   | 'Release'
 8 |
 9 | export interface ReleaseActions {
10 |   text: string
11 |   link: string
12 | }
13 |
14 | interface Release {
15 |   version: string
16 |   type: VersionType
17 |   description?: string
18 |   date: string
19 |   warning?: string
20 |   hash?: string
21 |   features?: string[]
22 |   fixed?: string[]
23 |   optimized?: string[]
24 |   breaking?: string[]
25 |   inProgress?: boolean
26 |   actions?: ReleaseActions[]
27 | }
28 |
29 | export type ReleasesData = Release[]
30 |
31 | export interface ReleaseItem {
32 |   type: VersionType
33 |   version: string
34 |   title?: string
35 |   date?: string | number
36 |   description?: string
37 |   warning?: string
38 |   hash?: string
39 |   fixed?: string[]
40 |   features?: string[]
41 |   optimized?: string[]
42 |   breaking?: string[]
43 |   inProgress?: boolean
44 |   actions?: ReleaseActions[]
45 |   feedbackLink?: string
46 | }
47 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/components/release/ReleaseList.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import type { ReleasesData } from './Release'
 3 | import ReleaseItem from './ReleaseItem.vue'
 4 |
 5 | const { data } = defineProps<{
 6 |   data: ReleasesData
 7 | }>()
 8 |
 9 | const releaseData = [...data].sort((a, b) => new Date(b.date).getTime() - new Date(a.date).getTime())
10 | </script>
11 |
12 | <template>
13 |   <div class="w-full">
14 |     <div class="container">
15 |       <ReleaseItem
16 |         v-for="item in releaseData"
17 |         :key="item.version"
18 |         :version="item.version"
19 |         :description="item.description"
20 |         :warning="item.warning"
21 |         :type="item.type"
22 |         :date="item.date"
23 |         :fixed="item.fixed"
24 |         :features="item.features"
25 |         :breaking="item.breaking"
26 |         :optimized="item.optimized"
27 |         :actions="item.actions"
28 |       />
29 |     </div>
30 |   </div>
31 | </template>
32 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/components/release/ReleasePage.vue:

 1 | <script setup lang="ts">
 2 | import type { ReleasesData } from './Release'
 3 | import ReleaseList from './ReleaseList.vue'
 4 |
 5 | defineProps<{
 6 |   data: ReleasesData
 7 |   title: string
 8 |   description: string
 9 | }>()
10 | </script>
11 |
12 | <template>
13 |   <ReleaseList :data="data" />
14 | </template>
15 |

/src/components/team/Member.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | export interface Member {
 2 |   name: string
 3 |   qq: string
 4 |   avatarPic?: string
 5 |   title: string
 6 |   company?: string
 7 |   companyLink?: string
 8 |   projects: Link[]
 9 |   location: string
10 |   languages: string[]
11 |   website?: Link
12 |   socials: Socials
13 |   sponsor?: boolean | string
14 |   reposPersonal?: string[]
15 | }
16 |
17 | export interface Link {
18 |   label: string
19 |   url: string
20 | }
21 |
22 | export interface Socials {
23 |   [x: string]: unknown
24 |   github: string
25 |   twitter?: string
26 |   bilibili?: string
27 | }
28 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/components/team/TeamHero.vue:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | <template>
 2 |   <div class="TeamHero">
 3 |     <div class="container">
 4 |       <h1 class="title">
 5 |         <slot name="title" />
 6 |       </h1>
 7 |       <p class="lead">
 8 |         <slot name="lead" />
 9 |       </p>
10 |       <p class="action">
11 |         <slot name="action" />
12 |       </p>
13 |     </div>
14 |   </div>
15 | </template>
16 |
17 | <style scoped>
18 | .TeamHero {
19 |   padding: 48px 24px;
20 | }
21 |
22 | @media (min-width: 768px) {
23 |   .TeamHero {
24 |     padding: 64px 32px 48px;
25 |   }
26 | }
27 |
28 | .container {
29 |   margin: 0 auto;
30 |   max-width: 960px;
31 | }
32 |
33 | .title,
34 | .lead {
35 |   transition: color 0.25s;
36 | }
37 |
38 | .title {
39 |   line-height: 32px;
40 |   font-size: 32px;
41 |   font-weight: 500;
42 | }
43 |
44 | @media (min-width: 768px) {
45 |   .title {
46 |     line-height: 40px;
47 |     font-size: 40px;
48 |   }
49 | }
50 |
51 | .lead {
52 |   padding-top: 8px;
53 |   font-size: 16px;
54 |   font-weight: 500;
55 |   max-width: 512px;
56 |   color: var(--vp-c-text-2);
57 | }
58 |
59 | .action {
60 |   padding-top: 4px;
61 | }
62 |
63 | .action :deep(a) {
64 |   display: inline-block;
65 |   line-height: 20px;
66 |   font-size: 14px;
67 |   font-weight: 500;
68 |   color: var(--vp-c-brand);
69 |   transition: color 0.25s;
70 | }
71 |
72 | .action :deep(a:hover) {
73 |   color: var(--vp-c-brand-dark);
74 | }
75 | </style>
76 |

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/composeTopicBody.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type ForumAPI from '@/apis/forum/api'
 2 | import { endsWith, startsWith, uniq } from 'lodash-es'
 3 |
 4 | export function composeTopicBody(
 5 |   body: string,
 6 |   options: {
 7 |     labels?: (string | null | undefined)[]
 8 |     state?: ForumAPI.TopicState
 9 |   },
10 | ): string {
11 |   const { labels, state } = options
12 |
13 |   const meta = {
14 |     ...(labels ? { labels: uniq(labels.filter(v => v)) } : {}),
15 |     ...(state ? { state } : {}),
16 |   }
17 |
18 |   return writeTopicBodyComment(body, meta)
19 | }
20 |
21 | export function writeTopicBodyComment(
22 |   body: string,
23 |   params: Record<string, unknown>,
24 | ): string {
25 |   if (!body)
26 |     return ''
27 |
28 |   const chunks = body.split(/(<!--.*(?=-->)-->)/gu)
29 |   const chunksComments = chunks.filter(
30 |     v => startsWith(v, '<!--') && endsWith(v, '-->'),
31 |   )
32 |   const chunksContents = chunks.filter(
33 |     v => !startsWith(v, '<!--') || !endsWith(v, '-->'),
34 |   )
35 |
36 |   const chunksJson = chunksComments
37 |     ? chunksComments.reduce((json, comment) => {
38 |         const commentContent = (comment || '')
39 |           .replace(/^<!--|-->$/gu, '')
40 |           .trim()
41 |         let newJson = json
42 |
43 |         try {
44 |           const commentJson = JSON.parse(commentContent)
45 |           newJson = { ...json, ...commentJson }
46 |         }
47 |         catch {}
48 |
49 |         return newJson
50 |       }, {})
51 |     : {}
52 |
53 |   return `<!-- ${JSON.stringify({ ...chunksJson, ...params })} -->${chunksContents.join('').trim()}`
54 | }
55 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/createDeferred.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { once } from 'lodash-es'
 2 |
 3 | interface Deferred<T> {
 4 |   promise: Promise<T>
 5 |   resolve: (value: T | PromiseLike<T>) => void
 6 |   reject: (reason?: any) => void
 7 | }
 8 |
 9 | export function createDeferred<T = void>(): Deferred<T> {
10 |   let resolve!: (value: T | PromiseLike<T>) => void
11 |   let reject!: (reason?: any) => void
12 |
13 |   const promise = new Promise<T>((res, rej) => {
14 |     resolve = once(res)
15 |     reject = once(rej)
16 |   })
17 |
18 |   return { promise, resolve, reject }
19 | }
20 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/executeWithAuth.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { Ref } from 'vue'
 2 | import type { CustomConfig } from '../../.vitepress/locales/types'
 3 | import { catchError } from '@/apis/utils'
 4 | import { useUserAuthStore } from '@/stores/useUserAuth'
 5 | import { toast } from 'vue-sonner'
 6 |
 7 | type ActionFunction<T extends unknown[], R = unknown> = (...args: T) => Promise<R>
 8 |
 9 | export async function executeWithAuth<T extends unknown[], R>(
10 |   action: ActionFunction<T, R>,
11 |   argument: T,
12 |   successMsg: string,
13 |   errorMsg: string,
14 |   message: Ref<CustomConfig>,
15 | ): Promise<R | false> {
16 |   const userAuth = useUserAuthStore()
17 |
18 |   if (!userAuth.isTokenValid) {
19 |     toast.info(message.value.forum.auth.loginTips)
20 |     return false
21 |   }
22 |
23 |   const [error, state] = await catchError<R>(action(...argument))
24 |
25 |   if (state !== undefined && !error) {
26 |     toast.success(successMsg)
27 |     return state
28 |   }
29 |   else {
30 |     toast.error(errorMsg)
31 |     return false
32 |   }
33 | }
34 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/getForumLocaleGetter.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | export function getForumLocaleLabelGetter() {
 2 |   const getLabel = (locale?: string | null | undefined) =>
 3 |     locale ? `LC-${locale}` : null
 4 |
 5 |   const getLocale = (label?: string | null | undefined) =>
 6 |     label ? String(label).replace(/^LC-/g, '') : null
 7 |
 8 |   const isLabel = (label?: string | null | undefined) =>
 9 |     label && String(label).startsWith('LC-')
10 |
11 |   return {
12 |     getLabel,
13 |     getLocale,
14 |     isLabel,
15 |   }
16 | }
17 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/getTopicTagLabelGetter.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | export function getTopicTagLabelGetter() {
 2 |   const constructList: [string, string][] = [
 3 |     ['DOCS-ISSUE', 'CATA-DOCS'],
 4 |     ['TYPOS-ISSUE', 'CATA-TYPOS'],
 5 |     ['DISPLAY-ISSUE', 'CATA-DISPLAY'],
 6 |     ['LOGIN-ISSUE', 'CATA-LOGIN'],
 7 |     ['PERFORMANCE-ISSUE', 'CATA-PERFORMANCE'],
 8 |     ['TRANSLATION-ISSUE', 'CATA-TRANSLATION'],
 9 |     ['OTHER-ISSUE', 'CATA-OTHER'],
10 |     ['PIN-ISSUE', 'CATA-PIN'],
11 |     ['ALL-PLATFORM', 'CATA-ALL-PLATFORM'],
12 |     ['WEB-PLATFORM', 'CATA-WEB-PLATFORM'],
13 |     ['CLIENT-PLATFORM', 'CATA-CLIENT-PLATFORM'],
14 |   ]
15 |
16 |   const forwardMap = new Map(constructList)
17 |
18 |   const reverseMap = new Map(constructList.map(([key, value]) => [value, key]))
19 |
20 |   const getTag = (label?: string | null | undefined) =>
21 |     reverseMap.get(label ?? '')
22 |
23 |   const getLabel = (tag?: string | null | undefined) =>
24 |     forwardMap.get(tag ?? '')
25 |
26 |   const isTag = (tag?: string | null | undefined) => forwardMap.has(tag ?? '')
27 |
28 |   const isLabel = (label?: string | null | undefined) =>
29 |     reverseMap.has(label ?? '')
30 |
31 |   const toTags = (labels?: string[] | null | undefined) =>
32 |     labels ? labels.map(label => getTag(label)) : []
33 |
34 |   const toLabels = (tags?: string[] | null | undefined) =>
35 |     tags ? tags.map(tag => getLabel(tag)) : []
36 |
37 |   return {
38 |     getTag,
39 |     getLabel,
40 |     isTag,
41 |     isLabel,
42 |     toTags,
43 |     toLabels,
44 |   }
45 | }
46 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/getTopicTagMap.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { useLocalized } from '@/hooks/useLocalized'
 2 |
 3 | export function getTopicTagMap() {
 4 |   const { message } = useLocalized()
 5 |
 6 |   return new Map([
 7 |     ['DOCS-ISSUE', message.value.forum.publish.tags.issue.docs],
 8 |     ['TYPOS-ISSUE', message.value.forum.publish.tags.issue.typos],
 9 |     ['DISPLAY-ISSUE', message.value.forum.publish.tags.issue.display],
10 |     ['LOGIN-ISSUE', message.value.forum.publish.tags.issue.login],
11 |     ['PERFORMANCE-ISSUE', message.value.forum.publish.tags.issue.performance],
12 |     ['TRANSLATION-ISSUE', message.value.forum.publish.tags.issue.translation],
13 |     ['OTHER-ISSUE', message.value.forum.publish.tags.issue.other],
14 |     ['PIN-ISSUE', message.value.forum.publish.tags.issue.pin],
15 |     ['ALL-PLATFORM', message.value.forum.publish.tags.platforms.all],
16 |     ['WEB-PLATFORM', message.value.forum.publish.tags.platforms.web],
17 |     ['CLIENT-PLATFORM', message.value.forum.publish.tags.platforms.client],
18 |   ])
19 | }
20 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/getTopicTypeLabelGetter.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | export function getTopicTypeLabelGetter() {
 2 |   const constructList: [string, string][] = [
 3 |     ['FEAT', 'TYP-FEAT'],
 4 |     ['ANN', 'TYP-ANN'],
 5 |     ['BUG', 'TYP-BUG'],
 6 |   ]
 7 |
 8 |   const forwardMap = new Map(constructList)
 9 |
10 |   const reverseMap = new Map(constructList.map(([key, value]) => [value, key]))
11 |
12 |   const getType = (label?: string | null | undefined) =>
13 |     reverseMap.get(label ?? '')
14 |
15 |   const getLabel = (type?: string | null | undefined) =>
16 |     forwardMap.get(type ?? '')
17 |
18 |   const isType = (type?: string | null | undefined) =>
19 |     forwardMap.has(type ?? '')
20 |
21 |   const isLabel = (label?: string | null | undefined) =>
22 |     reverseMap.has(label ?? '')
23 |
24 |   return {
25 |     getType,
26 |     getLabel,
27 |     isType,
28 |     isLabel,
29 |   }
30 | }
31 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/getTopicTypeMap.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { useLocalized } from '@/hooks/useLocalized'
 2 |
 3 | export function getTopicTypeMap() {
 4 |   const { message } = useLocalized()
 5 |
 6 |   return new Map([
 7 |     ['FEAT', message.value.forum.topic.type.feat],
 8 |     ['ANN', message.value.forum.topic.type.ann],
 9 |     ['BUG', message.value.forum.topic.type.bug],
10 |   ])
11 | }
12 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/getValidFilter.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { FilterType } from '~/stores/useForumData'
 2 |
 3 | import { filterSet } from '~/stores/useForumData'
 4 |
 5 | export function getValidFilter(value?: string): FilterType | null {
 6 |   if (import.meta.env.SSR)
 7 |     return null
 8 |   const filter = value || location.hash.slice(1)
 9 |   return filterSet.has(filter) ? (filter as FilterType) : null
10 | }
11 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/handleError.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type { Ref } from 'vue'
 2 | import type { CustomConfig } from '../../.vitepress/locales/types'
 3 | import { GiteeAPIError } from '@/apis/forum/gitee'
 4 | import { toast } from 'vue-sonner'
 5 |
 6 | export function handleError(
 7 |   error: Error | undefined,
 8 |   message: Ref<CustomConfig>,
 9 |   options?: {
10 |     errorMessage: string
11 |   },
12 | ) {
13 |   if (error instanceof GiteeAPIError) {
14 |     if (error.isExceededRateLimit()) {
15 |       return toast.error(message.value.forum.loadError, {
16 |         description: message.value.forum.exceededRateLimitWarning,
17 |         position: 'bottom-right',
18 |         action: {
19 |           label: message.value.forum.auth.login,
20 |           onClick: () => (location.hash = 'login-alert'),
21 |         },
22 |       })
23 |     }
24 |
25 |     if (error.isUnauthorized()) {
26 |       return toast.error(message.value.forum.loadError, {
27 |         description: `${message.value.forum.auth.loginTips} (${error.message})`,
28 |         position: 'bottom-right',
29 |         action: {
30 |           label: message.value.forum.auth.login,
31 |           onClick: () => (location.hash = 'login-alert'),
32 |         },
33 |       })
34 |     }
35 |   }
36 |
37 |   return toast.error(options?.errorMessage || message.value.forum.loadError)
38 | }
39 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/isAuthor.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 | import { useUserInfoStore } from '@/stores/useUserInfo'
2 | import { computed } from 'vue'
3 |
4 | export function isAuthor(id: string | number) {
5 |   const info = useUserInfoStore()
6 |
7 |   return computed(() => String(info.info?.id) === String(id))
8 | }
9 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/sanitizeMarkdown.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | export function sanitizeMarkdown(markdown: string | null | undefined): string {
 2 |   return (markdown || '')
 3 |     // 删除图片
 4 |     .replaceAll(/!\[(.*?)\]\((.*?)\)\s*(\{[^}]*\})?/g, '')
 5 |     // 删除HTML注释
 6 |     .replace(/<!--.*(?=-->)-->/gu, '')
 7 |     // 删除自定义定义标签
 8 |     .replace(/\{define:[^}]*\}.*?\{\/define\}/giu, '')
 9 |     // 删除颜色标签并保留其中内容
10 |     .replace(/\{color:[^}]*\}(.*?)\{\/color\}/giu, '$1')
11 | }
12 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/scrollTo.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { getScrollOffset } from 'vitepress'
 2 |
 3 | interface ScrollToOptions {
 4 |   offset?: number
 5 |   smooth?: boolean
 6 |   el?: Element
 7 |   hash?: string
 8 | }
 9 |
10 | export function scrollTo(options: ScrollToOptions = {}) {
11 |   if (import.meta.env.SSR || !location.hash)
12 |     return
13 |
14 |   const { el, offset = 0, smooth = true, hash = location.hash } = options
15 |
16 |   let target: Element | null = null
17 |
18 |   try {
19 |     target = el || document.getElementById(decodeURIComponent(hash).slice(1))
20 |   }
21 |   catch (e) {
22 |     console.warn(e)
23 |   }
24 |
25 |   if (target) {
26 |     const targetPadding = Number.parseInt(
27 |       window.getComputedStyle(target).paddingTop,
28 |       10,
29 |     )
30 |     const targetTop
31 |       = window.scrollY
32 |         + target.getBoundingClientRect().top
33 |         - getScrollOffset()
34 |         + targetPadding
35 |         + offset
36 |     function scrollToTarget() {
37 |       // only smooth scroll if distance is smaller than screen height.
38 |       if (!smooth || Math.abs(targetTop - window.scrollY) > window.innerHeight)
39 |         window.scrollTo(0, targetTop)
40 |       else window.scrollTo({ left: 0, top: targetTop, behavior: 'smooth' })
41 |     }
42 |     requestAnimationFrame(scrollToTarget)
43 |   }
44 | }
45 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/sessionCacheRedirect.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type ForumAPI from '@/apis/forum/api'
 2 | import { withBase } from 'vitepress'
 3 | import { useSharedTopicInfo } from './sharedTopicInfo'
 4 |
 5 | export function sessionCacheRedirect(
 6 |   cacheData: ForumAPI.Topic,
 7 |   hash?: string | number,
 8 | ) {
 9 |   if (cacheData.type === 'ANN')
10 |     return
11 |
12 |   useSharedTopicInfo(cacheData)
13 |
14 |   window.open(getRedirectUrlText(cacheData.id, hash), hash ? String(hash) : '')
15 | }
16 |
17 | export function getRedirectUrlText(
18 |   id: string | number,
19 |   hash?: string | number,
20 |   relativeLink = true,
21 | ) {
22 |   const rl = withBase(`./topic?number=${id}${hash ? `#${hash}` : ''}`)
23 |   if (relativeLink)
24 |     return rl
25 |   return `${location.protocol}//${location.host}${
26 |     location.pathname
27 |   }${rl.substring(1)}`
28 | }
29 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/sharedTopicInfo.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type ForumAPI from '@/apis/forum/api'
 2 | import type { ComputedRef } from 'vue'
 3 | import { computed } from 'vue'
 4 |
 5 | export const SHARED_TOPIC_INFO_KEY = 'topic-info'
 6 |
 7 | export function useSharedTopicInfo(
 8 |   topic?: ForumAPI.Topic,
 9 | ): ComputedRef<ForumAPI.Topic | null> {
10 |   if (import.meta.env.SSR)
11 |     return computed(() => null)
12 |   const data = sessionStorage.getItem(SHARED_TOPIC_INFO_KEY)
13 |
14 |   if (data && topic === undefined) {
15 |     sessionStorage.removeItem(SHARED_TOPIC_INFO_KEY)
16 |     return computed(() => JSON.parse(data))
17 |   }
18 |
19 |   if (!topic)
20 |     return computed(() => null)
21 |   sessionStorage.setItem(SHARED_TOPIC_INFO_KEY, JSON.stringify(topic))
22 |   return computed<ForumAPI.Topic>(() => topic)
23 | }
24 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/usePostData.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import type ForumAPI from '../../.vitepress/theme/apis/forum/api'
 2 | import BlogRewrites from '../_data/blogRewrites.json'
 3 |
 4 | import Blog from '../_data/posts.json'
 5 | import { getForumLocaleLabelGetter } from '../composables/getForumLocaleGetter'
 6 |
 7 | type BlogRewriteKey = keyof typeof BlogRewrites
 8 |
 9 | interface PostConfig {
10 |   rewriteUrl?: string
11 | }
12 |
13 | const localeLabelGetter = getForumLocaleLabelGetter()
14 |
15 | export function usePostData(locale: string) {
16 |   return {
17 |     paths() {
18 |       return Blog.filter(
19 |         post =>
20 |           post.tags
21 |           // eslint-disable-next-line unicorn/prefer-includes
22 |           && post.tags.some(
23 |             label =>
24 |               label === localeLabelGetter.getLabel(locale.toUpperCase()),
25 |           ),
26 |       ).map((entry) => {
27 |         return {
28 |           params: {
29 |             id: entry.id,
30 |             state: entry.state as ForumAPI.TopicState,
31 |             title: entry.title,
32 |             tags: entry.tags,
33 |             createdAt: entry.createdAt,
34 |             updatedAt: entry.updatedAt,
35 |             author: entry.user,
36 |             link: entry.link,
37 |             commentCount: entry.tags
38 |               .map(val => String(val))
39 |               .includes('NO-COMMENT')
40 |               ? -1
41 |               : entry.commentCount,
42 |             rewriteUrl: BlogRewrites[entry.id as BlogRewriteKey],
43 |           } satisfies ForumAPI.PostParams & PostConfig,
44 |           content: entry.contentRaw,
45 |         }
46 |       })
47 |     },
48 |   }
49 | }
50 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/composables/useTextCollapse.ts:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | import { computed, ref } from 'vue'
 2 |
 3 | export function useTextCollapse(contentRaw: string, maxLength: number = 180) {
 4 |   const isExpanded = ref(false)
 5 |   const hasOverflow = computed(() => {
 6 |     return contentRaw.replace(/!\[.*?\]\(.*?\)/g, '').length > maxLength
 7 |   })
 8 |   const collapseText = computed(() => {
 9 |     return isExpanded.value ? contentRaw : contentRaw.slice(0, maxLength)
10 |   })
11 |
12 |   const toggleExpand = () => {
13 |     isExpanded.value = !isExpanded.value
14 |   }
15 |
16 |   return {
17 |     isExpanded,
18 |     hasOverflow,
19 |     collapseText,
20 |     toggleExpand,
21 |   }
22 | }
23 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/en/blog/[id].md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | docInfo: false
 3 | layout: Post
 4 | outline: false
 5 | aside: false
 6 | docHeader: false
 7 | ---
 8 |
 9 | <script setup>
10 | import { withBase, useData } from 'vitepress'
11 |
12 | const { params } = useData()
13 |
14 | if(params.value?.rewriteUrl) {
15 |   history.replaceState({}, '', withBase(params.value?.rewriteUrl))
16 | }
17 | </script>
18 |
19 | <!-- @content -->
20 |

2 |
3 | export default usePostData('EN')
4 |

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/en/community.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | title: Join Community
 3 | layout: doc
 4 | ---
 5 |
 6 | ## Community Server
 7 |
 8 | <LinkGrid :items="server" />
 9 |
10 | <script setup lang="ts">
11 | import { serverLink } from '../components/links/Community'
12 |
13 | const server = [
14 |   serverLink('discord', 'Discord')
15 | ]
16 | </script>
17 |
18 | <style lang="scss" scoped>
19 | @use '../components/links/Community.scss';
20 | @include Community.main;
21 | </style>
22 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/en/disclaimer.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | title: 免责声明
 3 | layout: doc
 4 | aside: false
 5 | wip: true
 6 | ---
 7 |
 8 | 本站是基于 [leaflet](https://leafletjs.com/) 免费开源 JavaScript 地图库制作的《原神》游戏地图网站，本站所使用部分静态资源（包括但不限于文字、图片、音频、视频、图表、界面设计、版面框架、有关数据或电子文档等），其版权属于[上海米哈游影铁科技有限公司](https://www.mihayou.com/)及其关联公司。本站在基于其[游戏使用许可及服务协议](https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/company/agreement)规定下进行使用，相关文件的使用仅用于更好地表现游戏资料和进行相关的游戏交流
 9 |
10 | 本站的所有功能以及浏览均完全免费，本站的收入将完全用于对本站进行日常维护开销，本站相关人员不会以任何名义向用户强制索取任何非用于上述用途的财物或相关利益本站所提供的信息，均由本站相关用户上传提供，因此只供参考之用，本站相关人员一概对本站以任何方式就任何信息传递或传送的失误以及其合法性概不负责，亦不承担任何法律责任
11 |
12 | 本站部分功能将使用 cookie 与本地缓存。您可以通过修改浏览器设置的方式禁止本站使用 cookie，您也可以在浏览器中清空本地缓存。如果您选择禁止 cookie 或清除本地缓存，则可能导致您部分自定义的数据丢失或部分功能无法使用，敬请知晓。本站不会在任何情况下向第三方提供或分享任何基于 cookie 与本地缓存的用户信息
13 |
14 | [!["知识共享许可协议"](https://i.creativecommons.org/l/by-nc-sa/4.0/88x31.png '知识共享许可协议')](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/)
15 | 本网站采用[知识共享署名-非商业性使用-相同方式共享 4.0](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/)国际许可协议进行许可授权。
16 |

/src/en/download-client.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | title: Download Client
 3 | layout: doc
 4 | description: Currently we only offer the Windows Version of our map client, versions in other OS are in progress.
 5 | aside: false
 6 | ---
 7 |
 8 | ## Windows Client <Badge type="warning" text="Beta" />
 9 |
10 | <LinkGrid :items="downloadMethod" />
11 |
12 | If you are interested in aiding our development, consider [Join Us](./join)
13 |
14 | ## Map Client User Manual
15 |
16 | ```card
17 | title: Map Client User Manual
18 | link: /en/manual/client/
19 | theme: medium
20 | ```
21 |
22 | ## Web Version
23 |
24 | ```card
25 | title: Web Version Portal
26 | link: https://yuanshen.site
27 | theme: medium
28 | ```
29 |
30 | <script setup lang="ts">
31 | import { useUrlSearchParams } from '@vueuse/core'
32 | import { onMounted } from 'vue'
33 | import { clientLink, downloadJump } from '../components/links/Download.ts'
34 |
35 | const params = useUrlSearchParams('history')
36 | const downloadMethod = [
37 |   clientLink('sq', 'Community'),
38 |   clientLink('gd', 'Google Drive'),
39 | ]
40 |
41 | onMounted(()=> {
42 |   downloadJump(params, downloadMethod)
43 | })
44 | </script>
45 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/en/error.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | title: Error
 3 | description: Error
 4 | aside: true
 5 | layout: doc
 6 | head:
 7 |   - - script
 8 |     - src: ../error.js
 9 | ---
10 |
11 | # _Genshin Interactive Map_ has encountered some problems...
12 |
13 | ## What went wrong？
14 |
15 | _Genshin Interactive Map_ could not load properly due to the absence of critical files,
16 |
17 | Your browser may also be out of date.
18 |
19 | ## What should I do？
20 |
21 | - Please attempt to visit us using [Google Chrome](https://google.cn/chrome)
22 | - Please try to clear your browser cache and cookies
23 | - Please try disabling some extensions
24 | - Please wait and refresh later
25 | - If the problem persists, please reach out in [Discord](https://discord.gg/aFe57AKZUF) and provide your browser and OS info
26 |

 6 |

 8 | If you have proposals for a new idea or mechanic, join us to make it real.

19 | 2. Manage map-related communities (social media, message boards, etc.)；

21 |    Note: Not limited to English, we welcome any language that Genshin supports.

/src/en/manual/client/easter-egg.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | aside: false
 3 | layout: doc
 4 | title: Easter Eggs
 5 | ---
 6 |
 7 | [文：【彩蛋】查看历史版本内容]: # 'https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs/97056'
 8 |
 9 | Although version 1.6 and 2.8 has passed, the summer islands will be preserved in the client as an easter egg.
10 |
11 | Key in certain mysterious code to access summer island maps,
12 | Mysterious code
13 |
14 | > ↑↑↓↓←→←→BABA
15 |
16 | Key in the inverse of the mysterious code to turn off the easter egg
17 | Mysterious code
18 |
19 | > ↓↓↑↑→←→←ABAB
20 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/en/manual/client/fullscreen-windowed.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | aside: false
 3 | layout: doc
 4 | title: Launching The Game in Windowed Fullscreen
 5 | ---
 6 |
 7 | [文：【窗口全屏/无边框窗口模式】启动游戏]: # 'https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs/97887'
 8 |
 9 | **Windowed Fullscreen** lets the game run fullscreen while satisfying the [Overlay Mode](./overlay-mode)'s "running in non-fullscreen mode." pre-requisite. Allowing the map client to overlay the game while it's displaying fullscreen.
10 |
11 | ---
12 |
13 | You can launch Genshin Impact in **Windowed Fullscreen** with the following steps:
14 |
15 | - Step 1. Go to Genshin's installation folder
16 |
17 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/fullscreen-windowed/1.png)
18 |
19 | - Step 2. Open the folder named "Genshin Impact Game"
20 |
21 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/fullscreen-windowed/2.png)
22 |
23 | - Step 3. Create a shortcut on the Desktop for `GenshinImpact.exe`
24 |
25 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/fullscreen-windowed/3.png)
26 |
27 | - Step 4. Right-click on the shortcut and select Properties
28 |
29 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/fullscreen-windowed/4.png)
30 |
31 | - Step 5. In the Target text box, add " -popupwindow" to the end of the address. (remember the space)
32 |
33 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/fullscreen-windowed/5.png)
34 |
35 | ## Note
36 |
37 | - If your game resolution setting is "<span style="color: red">####x#### Fullscreen</span>" (exclusive fullscreen), please make sure that when you press Alt+Tab, the game window does not minimize. If the game minimizes please press Alt+Enter to exit exclusive fullscreen.
38 | - You can also use third party app to launch the game in Windowed Fullscreen.
39 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/en/manual/client/hide-show-done.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | aside: false
 3 | layout: doc
 4 | title: Change Pin Visibility
 5 | ---
 6 |
 7 | [文：【隐藏】标记/【显示】标记]: # 'https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs/127250'
 8 |
 9 | There are two display modes for Found pins:
10 |
11 | 1. **Show** - Highlight <b><span style="color: green">Found</span></b> pins
12 | 2. **Hide** - Fade <b><span style="color: green">Found</span></b> pins
13 |
14 | ---
15 |
16 | Show Found:
17 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/hide-show-done/Hide.png)
18 |
19 | Hide Found:
20 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/hide-show-done/show.png)
21 |

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/en/manual/client/save-restore.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | aside: true
 3 | layout: doc
 4 | title: Progress Recovery
 5 | ---
 6 |
 7 | [文：【存档丢失】存档还原/误删恢复]: # 'https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs/113007'
 8 | [#]: # '仅第 2 部分为原文直接翻译'
 9 |
10 | ### This feature requires a logged in Gitee account on your map client.
11 |
12 | [还原存档到历史位置]: # '更新为客户端内还原功能教程'
13 |
14 | ## 1. Return saves to an archived timestamp {#Return}
15 |
16 | Select **Restore** in the **Paimon Menu**
17 |
18 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/restore-recover/1.png)
19 |
20 | Select the desired save according to **Timestamp** and **Entries**, you can uncheck the "Current Save Only" option to restore from archives of other saves
21 |
22 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/restore-recover/2.png)
23 |
24 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/restore-recover/3.png)
25 |
26 | Once confirmed, a new save named "Restored Save" will be created to store the restored progress
27 |
28 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/restore-recover/4.png)
29 |
30 | ## 2. Accidental Save Deletion Recovery {#Recovery}
31 |
32 | Log into [Gitee](https://gitee.com/) and select "Create Code"
33 |
34 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/restore-recover/5.png)
35 |
36 | Locate the map client's cache folder, and select the desired save using "Date Modified"
37 |
38 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/restore-recover/6.png)
39 |
40 | Enter the file contents respectively into the section indicated in the picture below and submit, a save will appear in the list of saves on your map client.
41 |
42 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/restore-recover/7.png)
43 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/en/manual/faq/accountsafety/acntban.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | description: Kongying Tavern Genshin Interactive Map is a MulanPSL-1.0 open-source project, the original intent behind its development is to have stress-free fun in Genshin Impact. This tool is not and will never be a third-party cheating software, it will not read nor edit game data and does not engage in any process that undermines Genshin Impact's terms of service.
 3 | ---
 4 |
 5 | [文：使用地图会被封号吗？]: # 'https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs/97654'
 6 |
 7 | # Can I be Banned For Using Genshin Interactive Map?
 8 |
 9 | _Kongying Tavern Genshin Interactive Map_ is a MulanPSL-1.0 open-source project, the original intent behind its development is to have stress-free fun in Genshin Impact. This tool is not and will never be a third-party cheating software, it will not read nor edit game data and does not engage in any process that undermines Genshin Impact's terms of service.
10 |
11 | ---
12 |
13 | ```card
14 | title: Web Version Portal
15 | link: https://yuanshen.site
16 | theme: medium
17 | ```
18 |
19 | ```card
20 | title: Map Client Official Download
21 | link: ../../../download-client
22 | theme: medium
23 | ```
24 |
25 | ---
26 |
27 |  <div style="text-align: center;"><h3>Thank you for your trust and continuous support!</h3></div>
28 |

/src/en/manual/faq/autoupdate/updater.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | description: Between version updates, some setups will encounter a bug that prevents the auto-updater from launching, which will require you to run the updater manually.
 3 | ---
 4 |
 5 | [文：【自动更新】没有反应]: # 'https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs/102055'
 6 |
 7 | # [Auto Update] Non-Responsive Updater
 8 |
 9 | Between version updates, some setups will encounter a bug that prevents the auto-updater from launching, which will require you to run the updater manually.
10 |
11 | > If there is no auto-updater, or if the updater is not sufficiently recent, please visit the link below to download the latest updater:
12 | > https://download.yuanshen.site/d_0/YuanshendtUpdater.exe
13 |
14 | Updater directory:
15 |
16 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/autoupdate/updaterlocation.png)
17 |

/src/en/manual/faq/launcherror/emptydialog.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | description: Troubleshoot
 3 | ---
 4 |
 5 | [文：【无法打开】空窗提示或卡进度条]: # 'https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs/99662'
 6 |
 7 | # [Launch Error] Empty Dialog Box or Stuck Progress Bar
 8 |
 9 | There are three likely scenarios,
10 |
11 | 1. the client is stuck on 0%, and displays an empty dialogue
12 |
13 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/launcherror/1.png)
14 | (A firewall has blocked the API request, check your firewall and anti-virus provider)
15 |
16 | 2. the client is stuck on 0%, no dialogue appears
17 |
18 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/launcherror/2.jpeg)
19 | (Cache is corrupted, head to the directory in the following picture and delete PlayerPrefs.json)
20 |
21 | ![](/imgs/en/manual/launcherror/3.png)
22 |
23 | 3. the client is stuck on 100%, with no dialogue, this is a version 1.11 bug contained in the login module, and it can be resolved with the same method in scenario 2.
24 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/en/manual/faq/launcherror/versioncheck.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | description: An overwhelming amount of user access attempts can cause our server to become non-responsive.
 3 | ---
 4 |
 5 | [文：【无法打开】提示“数据查询失败”、“版本查询失败”]: # 'https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs/97055'
 6 |
 7 | # [Launch Error] Version Check Failed
 8 |
 9 | An overwhelming amount of user access attempts can cause our server to become non-responsive. Upon entering the map,
10 |
11 | - if the Paimon navigation menu does not show pin categories, relaunch the map client;
12 |
13 | - if the Paimon navigation menu functions properly, there is no need to relaunch, proceed to use the client as normal.
14 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/en/manual/faq/login/clientrepeatedly.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | description: Passwords that include "," (comma) will cause this problem, please remove it to avoid this issue.
 3 | ---
 4 |
 5 | [文：【每次打开都需重新登陆】]: # 'https://support.qq.com/products/321980/faqs/130500'
 6 |
 7 | # [Login] Client Repeatedly Requests Login
 8 |
 9 | Passwords that include "," (comma) will cause this problem, please remove it to avoid this issue.
10 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/en/privacy.md:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1 | ---
 2 | title: 隐私政策
 3 | layout: doc
 4 | aside: false
 5 | wip: true
 6 | ---
 7 |
 8 | # 隐私
 9 |
10 | 隐私是每个人的基本权利，我们非常尊重你的隐私。
11 |
12 | ### 我们如何处理你的数据
13 |
14 | 原神地图是采用 MulanPSL-1.0 许可的开源项目，我们服务器中不存储任何用户隐私数据。
15 |
16 | 其登录以及登录后的相关数据均由[Gitee（码云）](https://gitee.com/)提供并存储于 Gitee 服务器中，详细可见[Gitee 隐私政策](https://gitee.com/terms/privacy_terms)
17 |
18 | 我们的网站通过使用 Microsoft Clarity 和 Google Analytics 或百度统计来改进我们的产品和服务，以了解您如何使用我们的网站。使用我们的网站，即表示您同意我们和合作方可以收集和使用这些数据。
19 |
20 | 如需了解详情，请参阅：
21 |
22 | - [Google 的隐私权和条款](https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/)
23 | - [Google 保护您的数据](https://support.google.com/analytics/answer/6004245)
24 | - [微软隐私声明](https://privacy.microsoft.com/privacystatement)
25 | - [百度统计隐私政策](https://tongji.baidu.com/web/help/article?id=375&type=0)
26 |
27 | ### 个人信息的安全性
28 |
29 | 遗憾的是，通过互联网传输信息并不完全安全。尽管我们将实施并保持合理措施来保护您的个人信息，但我们不能保证通过本网站或以其他方式通过互联网传输的信息的安全性；对于任何信息传输，风险均由您自行承担。
30 |
31 | ### 联系和投诉
32 |
33 | 您可以通过 [yuanshenmap@gmail.com](mailto:yuanshenmap@gmail.com) 向我们报告隐私问题或者就本隐私政策提出问题、意见和请求。
34 |
35 | ### 变更
36 |
37 | 如果本隐私政策有任何变更，我们将在此发布更新的隐私政策。请定期访问本页面，查看本隐私政策是否有任何更新或变更。
38 |


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/src/en/sitemap.md:
